Posted by Todd Wood on September 17, 2015

The Iran Deal Survives Final Republican Challenge - Were The People Heard?

In crafting this deal as an executive agreement, President Obama bypassed the Constitution and the Congressional duty to approve treaties.  Perhaps he knew this deal would never get through Congress.  The Obama administration also withheld key documents from the entire Congressional process and the public, making it impossible to know exactly what was going on in the negotiations; i.e., what the United States was signing up for.  I don’t think anyone really knows what is in the deal completely, even today!  In any event, the next president is going to have a huge mess on his hands.  

No matter what poll you look at, public support for the Iran agreement has been dropping like a rock.  One recent poll showed support for the deal at a mere twenty-one percent.  So what we have here is a situation where the President of the United States has directly bypassed the will of the American people to spin his nefarious web of appeasing the real Islamic State’s mullahs.  He bypassed the people’s elected representatives and went against the will of the man on the street.  

So this begs the question, how does the average American Joe-bag-of-donuts get his opinion heard anymore?  How can the public get their opinion heard in Washington BEFORE a deal like this gets too far down the approval process on the road to becoming public policy?  How can we hold politicians accountable for their actions?

Enter stage right, eVoiceAmerica.com.  eVoiceAmerica is a new site that allows individuals to ensure their opinion reaches their elected representatives.  These opinions can be on a whole host of issues.  The great thing about the process that eVoiceAmerica.com has set up is that you can take action immediately, when you feel the urge!  The collective voices of middle America will be transmitted to their representatives in regular reports.  They won’t be able to ignore the will of the people any more!  Your representative, and the voters, will know if he is doing the people’s bidding, or his own.  Americans can hold their politicians accountable!  What a concept!

Many people are really angry about this Iran deal and the way it was handled.  Now you can do something about it.  Please check out EvoiceAmerica.com.  Sign up and let your voice be heard!

So give it try? Take Action Now?

                                               # # # # # # # # # # # 

What is the difference between statistical polling and eVoiceAmerica’s majority percentages?

OK, here’s what eVoiceAmerica’s percentages are not: they are not a dip-stick, snapshot, statistical polls of only 500-2000 people by phone at a single point in time.

These types of polls are notoriously inconsistent and of limited value.

eVoiceAmerica is, simply and powerfully, the American representative process made digital, daily, in real time, and over time as majority percentages. eVoiceAmerica takes the Town Hall from the local neighborhood to Washington DC with the kind of information a rep would acquire if he were to hold local town hall meetings.

Polls are snapshots and serve their purpose. However,eVoiceAmerica majority percentage data is continuous, historical, authentic, deep and wide, and encompasses American majorities, and ,when it matures to tens of millions of users, is based on a huge volume of grassroots data. eVoiceAmerica's majority percentages on individual issues is preserved and published in one of its many subscription Daily Data Reports and can be accessed by Americans, Congress folk, all media, universities, think tanks, etc.

With Your Contributions, eVoiceAmerica.com and the American People Will Restore Congress's Ability to Represent Us. America’s Documented, Majority Mandates to Congress Will End Gridlock and Impose Term Limits Without a Constitutional Amendment or Legislation.

These advertising and marketing efforts will motivate millions of Americans to join millions of “eVoiceAmericans” to generate potentially millions of opinions and eVotes to the President and Congress to create voting mandates on all top issues to Congress every day. These will, in turn, create national majorities on top issues important to Americans. eVoiceAmerica’s eVote data also creates voting majority mandates on all top issues for each  member of Congress (in the millions). eVoiceAmerica publishes this information  in numerous ways on site; to the media as issue-based, majority percentage; and by daily and monthly subscription reports (our revenue sources). 

Now Americans can know, for the first time in history, what mandates we are giving to Washington. If they vote our majorities, they will be re-elected; if not, they will be turned out – automatic term limits imposed by the voters. 

Gridlock ends because these 51% -70%+ majorities cross party, ethnicity, gender, economic and educational lines, so Congress can't vote party agendas, lobbyist influence,or self-interest without risking exposure by eVoiceAmerica and  defeat at the polls. 

Your donations create this measurable, lasting impact on Congress and the President, putting Americans back in charge by restoring our representative government. 

What eVoiceAmerica Needs 

Now that the site is fully functional and ready for prime time, with key endorsements, we need to raise $535,000. This amount will fund and launch ongoing, national and regional radio ad campaigns, social media marketing, and television advertising campaigns to inform Americans about eVoiceAmerica.com and expand its organization to support it with highly qualified researchers, analysts, marketing staff, and site programmers.

What You Get: Our Perks

BecauseeVoiceAmerica is a take-action and political data-generating, data-gathering and data disemination site, we do not have a physical product to offer as a perk.

Instead, 10% of your crowdfunding contribution will be donated to your choice of:

1)  Veterans' Home Building and Rehabilitation (example: Homes for Our Troops). Builds handicapped-adapted homes for wounded veterans and their families at no charge.  

2)  Childrens' Medical Treatment and Research (examples: Shriners Hospital for Children, St. Jude’s Children’s Hospital). Treatment is free to all patients and their families.

3)  A Constitutional Defense Fund (examples: Judicial Watch, American Center for Law & Justice, Landmark Legal Foundation). These organizations fund, file, and pursue lawsuits against the federal government for its unconstitutional violations of individual citizen’s rights.

4) Cancer Research & Treatment (examples: City of Hope, Huntsman Cancer Institute, and Mayo Clinic)  These organizations are accredited by that National Cancer Institute and provide genetic and other research to develop cures for cancer 

Now you can support restoring America and make a philanthropic donation to the causes of your choice at the same time. Please join us in doing both.

When our contributors see the vision of eVoiceAmerica.com and their generous donations exceed our goal, eVoiceAmerica will dedicate these funds to expanding the same impact of the federal site to the states, cities, and communities and the significant programming and research which that will require. With the extra / added funding, eVoiceAmerica can make these new services available far more quickly. eVoiceAmerica hopes to develop a data-mining service for the research into what Americans majority values and mandates are in all civic communities to give our elected leaders the input they need to implement the mind, will, and values of the People.

The Impact

Let’s peel the eVoiceAmerica.com "onion," shall we?

Layer 1: Easy eVote and Opinion Delivery to DC. As ordinary Americans, we realized that there was no way for Americans to easily communicate their opinions to their elected reps; to store this rep contact information for all of their DC reps in one place, provide this list for each login, and to deliver their opinions to several DC reps at the same time.  Below is a sample list as it appears on the site. Problem solved.

Layer 2: How Majority Mandates Are Created. We also realized the need to capture this historic data to anonymously document the issue-based, eVote-supported, AND constituent-validated data that create daily and real-time majority mandates: national, state, and district for each Senator and House member. eVoiceAmerica has accomplished “all of the above.” These solutions create accountability by the American people and the media because, with this data, we can know which members of Congress are voting with and are honoring their constituents’ majorities. The screen below show where Americans enter their eVotes and personal opinions. eVoiceAmerica captures aggregates, and delivers this information to Congress, the President, the media and to our users on site on a daily basis. Problem Solved.

Layer 3: How Your eVotes and Opinions Are Delivered. Upon submitting each opinion, users are again provided with their personalized list of elected reps with check boxes for each user to select with rep are to receive that opinion.

Layer 4: How Voters Impose Term Limits. This new, pioneering, history-making, published, majority/values data enables Americans AND the media to know which reps deserve re-election and which do not and should be booted out (“de-elected”) for failing to represent their constituent majorities. IMPACT: This automatically accomplishes de facto term limits (without a constitutional amendment - which Congress will NEVER pass - so we can do it without them).

Layer 5: Why eVoiceAmerica is Not a Poll. eVoiceAmerica also enables Americans to create majority mandates that reflect their values.  The “polling class” shows majority percentages on many top issues in the low 50s to high 60s, even 70+. These high percentages cross party, gender, ethnic, economic, educational lines and reflect the values and direction our country should be going.  So, there is powerful common ground among the American people, just not in Congress. IMPACT: Using eVoiceAmerica.com, these high, statistical-sample polls (sample shown below) can be converted to authentic opinions and eVote majority percentages which can then be converted to votes in Congress when legislation comes up --  and sometimes into veto-proof congressional votes to limit Presidential overreach.

Layer 6:  How eVoiceAmerica Data Is Conveyed Directly to Congress Each Day (Method 1). This new data is conveyed to Congress in two ways: 1) eVoiceAmerica provides a free, daily report to each member of Congress containing, by issue, information sufficient to validate constituency, the opinion, and Yes/No eVote percentages on each issue for all constituents. IMPACT: This report gives them their “marching orders” on current and future legislation. Below is a sample of this daily report to Congress.

How eVoiceAmerica Data Is Conveyed Directly to Congress Each Day (Method 2) and Ends Congressional Gridlock. Now let’s multiply this times 535 (all members of Congress) when  eVoiceAmerica provides its “Federal Congressional Coalition Builder Report” to all members of Congress. This report will permit all members of Congress to see the constituent report described above for all 535 of their congressional colleagues. Now, for the first time in history, 1) members can see constituent majorities on every issue for all members of Congress, whether Democrat or Republican, to form bipartisan coalitions in advance of a vote. 2) They can also see when members have 50/50 constituent percentages on a given issue and attempt to persuade them to vote with them, increasing the chance for a majority or even a veto-proof, super majority. 3) They can also “watch dog” members to prevent them from voting against their constituent majorities. IMPACT: No more gridlock caused by partisanship, backdoor deals, lobbying influence, self-serving votes, etc. With this new eVoiceAmerica information in the hands of all members of Congress, the People, and the media, now government gridlock can be unlocked because Congress realizes that they can’t ignore their constituents any longer. Americans are back in charge.

Layer 7: You Can Answer the Question Daily: "Would You Re-Elect Me Today?" regarding your reps. 

The political class in Congress are always concerned about being re-elected and spend countless tax dollars trying to insure their re-election. Let’s take the guess work out of it for them. The first time each day  eVoiceAmericans log in, they can answer the question, “Would You Re-Elect Me Today?” for all those on their recurring elected rep list. “Rep” is in quotes because it should read “elected politicians list,” because they only represent themselves most of the time. eVoiceAmerica tallies these yes/no votes into a daily reading / report on where they stand with their constituents. If they are truly representing their constituents, they will get majority “yes” votes and if not, the “no” votes will “de-elect” them in the next election. IMPACT: Now we can keep the pressure on Congress between elections, as James Madison advocated and foresaw, using daily, public opinion pressure to keep them on track. Madison would have been thrilled with eVoiceAmerica.com. Yet an another “eVoiceAmerican” way to impose term limits by us, the “outsiders.” Tables turned. Problem solved.

In the screen below, the user votes yes or no once a day if they would re-elect their reps today.

In the screen above, the user can see the yes/no percentages for the previous day. Our elected reps receive this information daily in their free "Daily Constituent Percentage Report." 

Layer 8: How You Can Educate Yourselves on the Issues Using Our Information Portal. This is a convenient way for Americans to access articles, books, and videos by issue, using eVoiceAmerica’s Info Portal to help educate themselves on issues and formulate educated opinions and eVotes.

Layer 9: 2016 Presidential Campaign Feature: This offers Americans a Daily 2016 Presidential ballot box where they can not only vote for or against candidates but they can also can also provide input to them as to why they support them or oppose them. eVoiceAmerica provides this data to the candidate and provides a real-time support percentages on site at the conclusion of the process. Only one “Support” vote keeps the "ballot stuffers" at bay.


Layer 10: You Can See Issue-Based Comments of the eVoiceAmerica Community. All users’ comments are sited within the issue upon which they opined to create a community that openly shares their ideas. The users’ actual names are not attached to these comments.

Monitization

eVoice shares much of its data with users for free on the site, including 1) recurring rep lists; 2) Would You Re-Elect Me?  constituent percentages for the previous day; 3) real-time and previous-day percentage on the issues; and 4) background articles on the issues in the Information Portal. eVoiceAmerica also emails a free daily constituent reports to all members of Congress to fulfill our site commitment to provide daily, issue-based, majority percentages to Congress. This is the ONLY report in which the user’s name is mentioned so reps can verify constituency and acknowledge their receipt of your opinions. All other reports are based on aggregated, anonymous data with no reference to individuals.

Revenue streams: eVoiceAmerica also generates subscription reports for various combinations of its data which is how the site is monetized, including 1) Top Issues Daily Percentage report to eVoiceAmerica users (currently programmed); 2) Federal Coalition Builder Report (programming in progress); 3) Re-Elect Me? reports to all members of Congress so all of them will know their standing with their constituents on a daily basis; 4) 2016 Presidential Campaign daily reports; and 5) other comprehensive data reports. All of these reports will be available when the data reaches a meaningful threshold.

Risks & Challenges

1) The potential for copycat sites; 2) malicious DDoS attacks intended to disrupt our site services by those threatened by eVoiceAmerica’s IMPACTs described above; 3) shutdown by onslaughts of massive, automated, non-human traffic (bots); 4) shutdown due to spikes in user traffic based on advertising; media, organizational, and pundit/commentator endorsements; and their issue-based, mobilization efforts; and 5) out-dated elected rep lists. eVoice has implemented solutions to all of the above threats as described below.

eVoiceAmerica.com has contracted with experts to prevent and neutralize all of  the above threats. Re #1,eVoiceAmerica has obtained a utility patent on its site and database programming and its data-gathering and data-dissemination programming (Patent No. 8,135,693). Re #2, eVoiceAmerica has contracted with Neustar for its DDoS protection services which scrub malicious traffic and return only clean traffic to the site with no disruption of service to our users. Re #3, eVoiceAmerica has retained Distil Networks to eliminate all automated, non-human traffic that would slow down or shutdown service.  Re #4, eVoiceAmerica has contracted with Varosis to provide auto-scaling to immediately accommodate traffic spikes and to load balance incoming traffic to prevent site crashes or slowdowns. Re #5, eVoiceAmerica receives updates from Zip Info who provides regular updates on the Congressional Districts Database and the Zip+4 database insure new registrants receive accurate elected reps lists. We also offer on-site access to the USPS.com zip-code finder for addresses added subsequent to the official Zip+4 updates to generate accurate elected rep matches to our users.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you aren’t in a position to contribute, sharing eVoiceAmerica.com and this crowdfunding campaign with family and friends would advance our common goals for America. Just go to www.evoiceamerica.com  to share the site, register, and submit opinions; and go to www.Indiegogo.com to share our crowdfunding campaign within your family and friends networks.

Layer 1: Easy eVote and Opinion Delivery to DC. As ordinary Americans, we realized that there was no way for
Americans to easily communicate their opinions to their elected reps; to store
this rep contact information for all of their DC reps in one place, provide this list for each login, and to deliver
their opinions to several DC reps at the same time.  Below is a sample list as it appears on the site. Problem solved. 

Layer 2: How Majority Mandates Are Created. We also realized the need to capture this historic data to
anonymously document the issue-based, eVote-supported, AND
constituent-validated data that create daily and real-time majority mandates:
national, state, and district for each Senator and House member. eVoiceAmerica has accomplished “all of the above.” These solutions create accountability by the
American people and the media because, with this data, we can know which
members of Congress are voting with and are honoring their constituents’
majorities. The screen below show where Americans enter their eVotes and personal opinions.
eVoiceAmerica captures aggregates, and delivers this information to Congress, the President, the media and to our users on site on a daily basis. Problem
Solved.

Layer 3: How Your eVotes and Opinions Are Delivered. Upon submitting each opinion, users are again provided with their personalized
list of elected reps with check boxes
for each user to select with rep are to receive that opinion.Layer 4: How Voters Impose Term Limits. This new, pioneering, history-making, published,
majority/values data enables Americans AND the media to know which reps deserve
re-election and which do not and should be booted out (“de-elected”) for
failing to represent their constituent majorities. IMPACT: This automatically
accomplishes de facto term limits
(without a constitutional amendment - which Congress will NEVER pass - so we can do it without them).Layer 5: Why eVoiceAmerica is Not a Poll. eVoiceAmerica also enables Americans to create majority
mandates that reflect their values.  The
“polling class” shows majority percentages on many top issues in the low 50s to
high 60s, even 70+. These high percentages cross party, gender, ethnic, economic,
educational lines and reflect the values and direction our country should be
going.  So, there is powerful common ground among the
American people, just not in Congress. IMPACT: Using eVoiceAmerica.com, these
high, statistical-sample polls (sample shown below) can be converted to authentic opinions and eVote
majority percentages which can then be converted to votes in Congress when
legislation comes up --  and sometimes
into veto-proof congressional votes to limit Presidential overreach.

Layer 6:  How eVoiceAmerica Data Is Conveyed Directly to Congress Each Day (Method 1). This new data is
conveyed to Congress in two ways: 1) eVoiceAmerica provides a free, daily
report to each member of Congress containing, by issue, information sufficient
to validate constituency, the opinion, and Yes/No eVote percentages on each
issue for all constituents. IMPACT: This report gives them their “marching
orders” on current and future legislation. Below is a sample of this daily report to Congress.

How eVoiceAmerica Data Is Conveyed Directly to Congress Each Day (Method 2) and Ends Congressional Gridlock. Now let’s multiply this times 535 (all members of Congress)
when  eVoiceAmerica provides its “Federal
Congressional Coalition Builder Report” to all members of Congress. This report will permit all members of
Congress to see the constituent report described above for all 535 of their
congressional colleagues. Now, for the first time in history, 1) members can
see constituent majorities on every issue for all members of Congress, whether
Democrat or Republican, to form bipartisan coalitions in advance of a vote. 2)
They can also see when members have 50/50 constituent percentages on a given
issue and attempt to persuade them to vote with them, increasing the chance for
a majority or even a veto-proof, super majority. 3) They can also “watch dog”
members to prevent them from voting against their constituent majorities.
IMPACT: No more gridlock caused by partisanship, backdoor deals, lobbying
influence, self-serving votes, etc. With this new eVoiceAmerica information in
the hands of all members of Congress, the People, and the media, now government
gridlock can be unlocked because Congress realizes that they can’t ignore their
constituents any longer. Americans are back in charge.

Layer 7: You Can Answer the Question Daily: "Would You Re-Elect Me Today?" regarding your reps. The political class in Congress are always concerned about
being re-elected and spend countless tax dollars trying to insure their
re-election. Let’s take the guess work out of it for them. The first time each
day  eVoiceAmericans log in, they can
answer the question, “Would You Re-Elect Me Today?” for all those on their
recurring elected rep list. “Rep” is in quotes because it should read “elected
politicians list,” because they only represent themselves most of the time.
eVoiceAmerica tallies these yes/no votes into a daily reading / report on where
they stand with their constituents. If they are truly representing their
constituents, they will get majority “yes” votes and if not, the “no” votes
will “de-elect” them in the next election. IMPACT: Now we can keep the pressure
on Congress between elections, as
James Madison advocated and foresaw, using daily, public opinion pressure to
keep them on track. Madison would have been thrilled with eVoiceAmerica.com.
Yet an another “eVoiceAmerican” way to impose term limits by us, the
“outsiders.” Tables turned. Problem solved.In the screen below, the user votes yes or no once a day if they would re-elect their reps today.

In the screen above, the user can see the yes/no percentages for the previous day. Our elected reps receive this information daily in their free "Daily Constituent Percentage Report." 

Layer 8: How You Can Educate Yourselves on the Issues Using Our Information Portal. This is a convenient way for Americans to
access articles, books, and videos by issue, using eVoiceAmerica’s Info Portal
to help educate themselves on issues and formulate educated opinions and
eVotes.

Layer 9: 2016 Presidential Campaign Feature: This offers Americans a Daily
2016 Presidential ballot box where they can not only vote for or against candidates
but they can also can also provide input to them as to why they support them or
oppose them. eVoiceAmerica provides this data to the candidate and provides a
real-time support percentages on site at the conclusion of the process. Only one “Support”
vote keeps the "ballot stuffers" at bay.


Layer 10: You Can See Issue-Based Comments of the eVoiceAmerica Community. All users’ comments are sited within the issue upon which they
opined to create a community that openly shares their ideas. The users’ actual
names are not attached to these comments.

Monitization
eVoice shares much of its data with users for free on the site,
including 1) recurring rep lists; 2) Would You Re-Elect Me?  constituent
percentages for the previous day; 3) real-time and previous-day percentage on
the issues; and 4) background articles on the issues in the Information Portal.
eVoiceAmerica also emails a free daily constituent reports to all members of Congress to fulfill our site commitment to provide daily, issue-based, majority
percentages to Congress. This is the ONLY report in which the user’s
name is mentioned so reps can verify constituency and acknowledge their receipt of
your opinions. All other reports are based on aggregated, anonymous data with
no reference to individuals. 

Revenue streams: eVoiceAmerica also generates subscription
reports for various combinations of its data which is how the site is
monetized, including 1) Top Issues Daily Percentage report to eVoiceAmerica
users (currently programmed); 2) Federal Coalition Builder Report (programming
in progress); 3) Re-Elect Me? reports to all members of Congress so all of them will
know their standing with their constituents on a daily basis; 4) 2016 Presidential Campaign
daily reports; and 5) other comprehensive data reports. All of these reports
will be available when the data reaches a meaningful threshold. 
Risks & Challenges
1) The potential for copycat
sites; 2) malicious DDoS attacks intended to disrupt our site services by those
threatened by eVoiceAmerica’s IMPACTs described above; 3) shutdown by
onslaughts of massive, automated, non-human traffic (bots); 4) shutdown due to
spikes in user traffic based on advertising; media, organizational, and
pundit/commentator endorsements; and their issue-based, mobilization efforts;
and 5) out-dated elected rep lists. eVoice has implemented solutions to all of the above threats as described below.
eVoiceAmerica.com has
contracted with experts to prevent and neutralize all of  the above threats. Re #1,eVoiceAmerica has obtained a utility patent on its site and
database programming and its data-gathering and data-dissemination programming
(Patent No. 8,135,693). Re #2, eVoiceAmerica has contracted with Neustar for its
DDoS protection services which scrub malicious traffic and return only clean
traffic to the site with no disruption of service to our users. Re #3,
eVoiceAmerica has retained Distil Networks to eliminate all automated,
non-human traffic that would slow down or shutdown service.  Re #4, eVoiceAmerica has contracted with
Varosis to provide auto-scaling to immediately accommodate traffic spikes and
to load balance incoming traffic to prevent site crashes or slowdowns. Re #5,
eVoiceAmerica receives updates from Zip Info who provides regular updates on
the Congressional Districts Database and the Zip+4 database insure new registrants receive accurate elected reps lists. We also offer on-site
access to the USPS.com zip-code finder for addresses added subsequent to the
official Zip+4 updates to generate accurate elected rep matches to our users.
Other Ways You Can Help

If you aren’t in a position to contribute, sharing eVoiceAmerica.com
and this crowdfunding campaign with family and friends would advance our common goals
for America. Just go to www.evoiceamerica.com  to share the site, register, and submit opinions; and go to www.Indiegogo.com to share our
crowdfunding campaign within your family and friends networks.

story:
ENGLISH VERSION BELOW

El Malpensante entra por los ojos, por ello la ilustración es una de las marcas de estilo de esta revista literaria. A lo largo 182 ediciones han pasado por nuestras páginas tanto los ilustradores más destacados del mundo como prometedores dibujantes que han crecido junto a nosotros. 

Firmas internacionales como las de Eva Vázquez, Marcos Guardiola, Fernando Vicente, Yuko Shimizu, Paul Blow y Álvaro Tapia Hidalgo suelen encontrarse en una misma edición con figuras colombianas como Santiago Guevara, Elizabeth Builes, Diego Patiño, Rodez, Lorena Correa o Juan Gaviria.

Estos encuentros resultan en diversidad de estilos, técnicas y miradas que enriquecen la experiencia de leer cada edición de El Malpensante. Por eso, para celebrar nuestros 20 años, publicaremos un libro que recopile trabajos destacados entre las piezas de más de 500 ilustradores que han aparecido hasta ahora en nuestras páginas.

Para hacer realidad este libro necesitamos el aporte de todos ustedes: tanto de nuestros amigos ilustradores, como de todos los lectores y seguidores de la revista que disfrutan mes a mes del escenario gráfico que preparamos cuidadosamente.

Contamos con más de una decena de recompensas para todos los gustos y bolsillos: desde ilustraciones digitales e impresas hasta el cupo para participar en un taller con un prestigioso ilustrador internacional en Bogotá. Y, por supuesto, el libro: solo, autografiado, en empaque especial y acompañado por otros beneficios.

Todos los aportes son muy valiosos para nosotros y nos ayudarán a producir 1.000 ejemplares de esta edición conmemorativa titulada Ilustración Malpensante 20 años. Se trata de un tiraje limitado, pero la mayoría de recompensas de esta campaña incluyen libros, precisamente porque queremos que todos los malpensantes y amantes de la ilustración se lleven al menos un ejemplar exclusivo. El dinero recaudado será utilizado para financiar cada paso del proceso editorial que nos permitirá materializar este concepto: selección, diseño, redacción, diagramación, impresión divulgación y distribución. También nos ayudará a cubrir los viáticos y honorarios de nuestro ilustrador invitado.

Este libro de ilustración editorial no solo será un dulce para los ojos, también será una mirada detenida al oficio de la ilustración editorial. Las imágenes que recrean cuentos, descifran conceptos y reinterpretan rostros conocidos a través de retratos originales estarán acompañadas por perfiles críticos sobre los ilustradores y textos en los que se muestra el proceso, tanto del lado del creador como desde quienes lo editamos hasta llegar a ese armónico resultado que vincula texto e imagen en una misma página. Queremos compartir este registro de lo más selecto de nuestra ilustración y ofrecer una herramienta de consulta que sea a la vez una ventana a la historia reciente de la ilustración editorial.

Ilustración Malpensante 20 años será un referente para todos los ilustradores, una mirada detenida sobre el oficio de interpretar gráficamente textos literarios y un catálogo de artistas junto a sus piezas más impactantes y conmovedoras a disposición de quienes, como nosotros, aman este oficio.

Un libro imprescindible para ilustradores y amantes de la ilustración.

¡Ayúdanos a hacerlo posible! Haz parte de este proyecto y no te quedes sin tu libro.

Difunde esta campaña y compártela a través de tus redes sociales. ¡Pasa la voz!

¡Gracias!

© Ana Yael

 

El Malpensante draws attention because of its looks (before the reader becomes absorbed in its stories). Illustration is one of the style marks of this literary magazine, and throughout 182 editions, our pages have been embellished both by the most outstanding illustrators of the world as by promising beginners who have grown up along with us.

International prospects such as Eva Vazquez, Marcos Guardiola, Fernando Vicente, Yuko Shimizu, Paul Blow and Álvaro Tapia Hidalgo are often found in the same edition with Colombian ones such as Santiago Guevara, Elizabeth Builes, Diego Patiño, Rodez, Lorena Correa and Juan Gaviria.

These meetings result in a miscellany of styles, techniques and perspectives that add flavor to the reads experience. Therefore, to celebrate our 20 years, we will publish a book that assembles the most outstanding pieces among the work of more than 500 illustrators that have appeared in our pages.

To make it happen, we need your contribution: both from sympathetic illustrators and all the readers and followers of this magazine, who enjoy the graphic scenario we carefully lay down on a monthly basis.

We have more than a dozen perks for every taste and budget: from digital and printed illustrations, to access to a workshop with a prestigious international illustrator in Bogotá. And, of course, the book, be it by itself, autographed, in a special packaging or along with other benefits.

Every single contribution is valuable, and will help us produce 1.000 copies of this commemorative edition. This is a limited print run, so most of the rewards in this campaign include books, precisely because we want every illustrator and illustration enthusiast to have at least one unique copy. The money raised will be used to finance each step of the editorial process that will allow us to materialize this vision: selection, design, writing, layout, diffusion, printing and distribution. It will also help us to pay the travel allowance and fees of our guest master illustrator.

This book will not only be an eye candy, but also a close look at the craftsmanship and behind the scenes of editorial illustration: images that recreate stories, translate concepts and reinterpret familiar faces in original portraits, will go together with the illustrators profiles and critical excerpts on their style and workflow, from both the authors and the editors who help them achieve a harmonic bond between images and text.

Illustración Malpensante 20 años will be a window to the recent history of editorial illustration in Colombia and the rest of the world; a close look to this job; a reference guide for everybody involved and a collection of some the most striking and moving pieces for those who, like us, love this craft.

Help us make it possible! Be part of this project and get your book now.

Please, do share this campaign through your social networks and spread the word!

Thanks for your support!

© Juan Gaviria

http://www.elmalpensante.com/

story:
"To understand is to perceive patterns" -Isaiah Berlin

About 542 million years ago, something weird and profoundly remarkable happened on Earth. Quite suddenly, life went inventively crazy, proliferating from simple, rudimentary single-cell organisms into myriad multi-cellular forms. Evolution discovered the idea of more sophisticated and specialized cells, and most of the basic body plans we know today. Biologists call it the Cambrian explosion. 

Today, we are on the verge of yet another event of astronomical significance, akin to some kind of Intelligence Supernova, which I refer to as the Syntellect Emergence. Most people are still simply oblivious of this rapidly approaching "galactic event" that we are about to witness in our lifetimes. 

All organisms, from one-celled bacteria to humans, live in different perceptual realities, in their own "virtual worlds". Your body is a collection of trillions of cells and microorganisms. While a certain process in your body is "unconscious" to you, it is an interaction within the network of entangled conscious entities in your body, having their own conscious experience, at their own layer of existence. The whole symphony of existence arises from a set of rules, and we start to uncover one of its deepest secrets - the multiversal fractality of networks of networks of networks of conscious entities in both directions, up and down, seemingly ad infinitum. 

The ability of future "self-aware" superintelligent machines and enhanced humans alike to instantly transfer knowledge and directly share experiences with each other in digital format will lead to evolution of intelligence from relatively isolated individual minds to the global community of hyperconnected digital minds, the Syntellect.

The hierarchy of this emergent Global Brain cognitive architecture will likely to persist through the next stage of the technological Singularity. Just like the human brain consists of different areas (simplistically divided into an amphibian, reptilian, mammalian brain) and certain neural functional regions, such as the highly "coveted" neocortex, where would your future "individuated mind" fit into this new "reshuffling of the deck"? Will you be an insider, or an outsider? Will you be "in the know"?

story:
Pre-Order - Support - Share 

 

Share on Facebook

My soul-searching journey of thriving beyond betrayal, alcoholism, incarceration, and reckless regard for life.

Years ago, before my "mess" would become my "message," life was far from ideal.

In fact, my life was in major crisis. My world was shattered when my then wife of seven years said, "I'm seeing someone, and there's more..”

Dazed, confused, and lost, I tried to make sense of it all.

Why was this happening? 

Over the next six months, I spiraled into a deep depression where life, my purpose for being and my relationship with myself and my family would fracture to pieces. 

With no regard for life, I got behind the wheel of my car drunk out of my mind. After eluding a sheriff deputy twice, (high-speed chase) I crashed into another driver in the middle of an intersection. (Thank God, the driver had only suffered a broken collar bone.)

For the next four days, I’d sit inside a cell cringing towards "the future."

Who had I become?

Before I’d learn how to shift life radically, I’d first have let go of everything that mattered most to understand "why."

Then, with "the power of gratitude" and therapy -- life shifted for the best. The essence of thriving beyond my worst nightmare became reality, as gratitude got me through alcoholism, depression, incarceration, and divorce with special circumstances.

I've been honored to share my story on live television, (NBC's The Morning Blend) at book talks at Barnes & Noble bookseller locations, and grateful my story was published in Chicken Soup for the Soul. I've been featured in The Good Men Project and The Huffington Post.

These publications gave me an opportunity to tell my story and bring awareness to challenges we face as a society.

Preorder and support two charities.

This book is more than about my story. This book is about serving a cause as an ex-alcoholic, and trauma survivor people need help and better solutions.​
23.5 million Americans are addicted to alcohol and drugs. (Statistics cited by drugfree.org)

As the number of stress, related addictions continues to rise, the question remains,

How can we aid addiction recovery, homelessness prevention, and post-traumatic stress awareness?

By being part of the solution, a percentage of proceeds of this campaign and "Thriving Beyond: From Tragedy to Triumph"  will benefit Halo, Inc, and PTS Faces in the fight against addictions, homelessness, suicide, and post-traumatic stress disorders.

Halo Inc.

 

HALO is so much more than a bed.

The Homeless Assistance Leadership Organization offers each person an opportunity to begin their journey from dependency towards self-sufficiency. We understand that each person that enters our shelter program comes with their own dreams, goals, and needs, and it is our goal to help them reach these goals safely.

Statement of Need

Homelessness is a very real issue for Racine County. Racine continues to have the highest unemployment rate and second highest child homelessness rate among Wisconsin cities. Last year, HALO served 700 individuals including 138 children, 58% under the age of six.

With the current rate of poverty, 55 of every 10,000 Racine County residents will experience homelessness. Since 2007, the estimated total of homeless individuals in Wisconsin has increased 8%. (Source: Institute for Community Alliances) 

 

PTS Faces

Cherissa Jackson who began PTS Faces is a PTS survivor who was challenged with symptoms of PTS, she wanted to create a global platform that would bring awareness to the treatment and treatment options for PTS Veterans. PTS Faces provides support groups, partnerships, Medical Teams, webinars, etc. all to provide a One Stop Shop for help to any Veteran looking for assistance.

 

Family is everything 

Found Love Again

I'm an ordinary guy, that has been through extraordinary obstacles and beyond.

Because of the insurmountable challenges, life has taken a turn for the best and I've coached others in creating a message out of their mess. It all starts from the "inside out," for clients.

BONUS CHAPTERS

  • 7 Ways to Ignite Your Mess Into A Message That Inspires
  • Super Bonus Chapter How To Get Featured on Media with FREE Exposure

Why "Thriving" is better than "Surviving"

As 23 million Americans are currently addicted to alcohol and or other drugs it's time we find real solutions that create a community of "thriver's" and not just "survivor's."

Overwhelm and tragedy have long been known to be risk factors for developing drug and or alcohol dependency, as they're often used as a way to numb or dull feelings and manage emotions associated with stress and trauma.

Addicts and trauma survivors try to avoid pain, but studies have shown personal adversity to be an ignitor of a period of exponential growth.

During alcoholic recovery meetings with Alcoholics Anonymous groups, I noticed a large need for fostering growth beyond the recovery stage of addiction as I saw a lot of addicts backslide.

Recovery has its place but after severe trauma recovery isn't enough. 

Which is why digging deeper into the "power of gratitude," and "thriving" over "surviving" can shed light on why addiction recovery and post-traumatic stress victims need this book in their hands.

In fact, studies have shown after overcoming addiction withdrawals, trauma, and periods of great adversity. There enters a period of exponential growth through self-awareness of two constants  -- challenges and change.

Adopting this new perspective, we can conform and play small, or we can step up and evolve. Challenges awaken a purpose-driven mission -- to serve the greater good.

Pre-Order - Support - Share 
 Share on FacebookMy soul-searching journey of thriving beyond betrayal, alcoholism, incarceration, and reckless regard for life.Years ago, before my "mess" would become my "message," life was far from ideal.In fact, my life was in major crisis. My world was shattered when my then wife of seven years said, "I'm seeing someone, and there's more..”Dazed, confused, and lost, I tried to make sense of it all.Why was this happening? Over the next six months, I spiraled into a deep depression where life, my purpose for being and my relationship with myself and my family would fracture to pieces. With no regard for life, I got behind the wheel of my car drunk out of my mind. After eluding a sheriff deputy twice, (high-speed chase) I crashed into another driver in the middle of an intersection. (Thank God, the driver had only suffered a broken collar bone.)For the next four days, I’d sit inside a cell cringing towards "the future."Who had I become?Before I’d learn how to shift life radically, I’d first have let go of everything that mattered most to understand "why."Then, with "the power of gratitude" and therapy -- life shifted for the best. The essence of thriving beyond my worst nightmare became reality, as gratitude got me through alcoholism, depression, incarceration, and divorce with special circumstances.I've been honored to share my story on live television, (NBC's The Morning Blend) at book talks at Barnes & Noble bookseller locations, and grateful my story was published in Chicken Soup for the Soul. I've been featured in The Good Men Project and The Huffington Post.These publications gave me an opportunity to tell my story and bring awareness to challenges we face as a society.Preorder and support two charities.This book is more than about my story. This book is about serving a cause as an ex-alcoholic, and trauma survivor people need help and better solutions.​ 

23.5 million Americans are addicted to alcohol and drugs. (Statistics cited by drugfree.org)
As the number of stress, related addictions continues to rise, the question remains,How can we aid addiction recovery, homelessness prevention, and post-traumatic stress awareness?By being part of the solution, a percentage of proceeds of this campaign and "Thriving Beyond: From Tragedy to Triumph"  will benefit Halo, Inc, and PTS Faces in the fight against addictions, homelessness, suicide, and post-traumatic stress disorders.Halo Inc. HALO is so much more than a bed.The Homeless Assistance Leadership Organization offers each person an opportunity to begin their journey from dependency towards self-sufficiency. We understand that each person that enters our shelter program comes with their own dreams, goals, and needs, and it is our goal to help them reach these goals safely.Statement of NeedHomelessness is a very real issue for Racine County. Racine continues to have the highest unemployment rate and second highest child homelessness rate among Wisconsin cities. Last year, HALO served 700 individuals including 138 children, 58% under the age of six.With the current rate of poverty, 55 of every 10,000 Racine County residents will experience homelessness. Since 2007, the estimated total of homeless individuals in Wisconsin has increased 8%. (Source: Institute for Community Alliances)  PTS FacesCherissa Jackson who began PTS Faces is a PTS survivor who was challenged with symptoms of PTS, she wanted to create a global platform that would bring awareness to the treatment and treatment options for PTS Veterans. PTS Faces provides support groups, partnerships, Medical Teams, webinars, etc. all to provide a One Stop Shop for help to any Veteran looking for assistance. Family is everything Found Love AgainI'm an ordinary guy, that has been through extraordinary obstacles and beyond.Because of the insurmountable challenges, life has taken a turn for the best and I've coached others in creating a message out of their mess. story:
¿Que son Los Archivos de la Biblioteca del Templo Jedi?

 

Es el primer libro que va a acercar al fan todas las novedades de libros, comics y revistas de la Guerra de las Galaxias, aparecidas entre junio y diciembre del 2016. 

Ordenadas por mes y por pais, tendreis una guia en la que consultar todo, desde la portada, precios, datos técnicos y sinopsis de cada obra.

Podreis disfrutar de las novedades de España, USA/UK, Francia, Alemania, Italia...

España y USA/UK traeran el 100% de sus novedades, y el resto de paises, sus obras mas importantes o reseñables.

Ademas, como complemento a esto, habra dos entrevistas. Una a un super coleccionista de este tipo de material, como es Jose M. Arosa, con una de las colecciones mas grandes que existen; y una segunda entrevista, a un autor de libros sobre la Guerra de las Galaxias, que es ni mas ni menos que Jose Gracia, quien ha escrito libros como "Herederos de la Guerra de las Galaxias" y "La Guerra de las Galaxias Scrapbook".

 

 

Sobre el autor:

Gorka Salgado Sautu

 

Gorka Salgado Sautu, 26 de Mayo de 1978. Actualmente vive en Bilbao

Creador y Director de La Biblioteca del Templo Jedi

¿Pero que es la Biblioteca del templo jedi?

Es un grupo de Facebook creado para que todos los fans de La Guerra de las Galaxias, tuviesemos un lugar donde tener todas las novedades, autores, entrevistas, charlas y cualquier otra idea que se nos ocurriese, sobre los libros, comics y revistas de nuestra saga favorita.

Con el tiempo, este lugar de encuentro se ha ido ampliando con cuentas en Twitter e Instagram; con una canal de youtube del mismo nombre, donde realizamos y compartimos videoreseñas (Reviews) sobre libros/comics/revistas; y por ultimo, un canal de Ivoox, donde compartimos audios para escuchar sobre la guerra de las galaxias.

COLABORADORES:

Jose Gracia: Autor de varias obras sobre La Guerra de las Galaxias (Herederos, Scrapbook), es el encargado del diseño grafico y la portada.

Jose M. Arosa:   Una de las personalidades del fandom Español mas conocido y uno de los mayores coleccionistas, como colaborador en la edicion del libro.

 

 

¿Como?

Para este proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 1500€; Con esta cantidad conseguiríamos, una edición limitada de 200 ejemplares. 

Los mecenas de este proyecto tendrán ventajas como:

- Recibir un ejemplar dedicado y firmado por el autor.

- Ver tu nombre e incluso tu foto en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

- Recibir una lamina de regalo especial de Los Archivos de la Biblioteca del Templo Jedi

Los fondos recaudados, se utilizarán para sacar adelante esta edición de Los Archivos de la Biblioteca del Templo Jedi que saldría para mediados de diciembre y seria entregado bien por correo o en mano, a las personas que hayan contribuido.

Short Summary

The Author is former political refugee from the poor small nation of Nicaragua, forced out his land as a young man by a revolution that claimed tens of thousands of lives in 1979. He arrived in California escaping the war and became a part of another revolution, --the technology revolution in the Silicon Valley-- where he strived to become a wealthy man and someday go back to his homeland to help the poor in the small town where he was born.  Although he did enjoy some financial success, he was never able to achieve his lofty goals, despite having worked for over ten startup companies in the Silicon Valley in search of his elusive dream and eventually, gave up on his noble dream and settled for a standard upper middle class life where he currently resides with his wife and kids.

An inconceivable MIRACLE he witnessed, turned his life upside down and his once desire to make tons of money, vanishes!  And as a result of that conversion back to the faith -- after spending the majority of  his adult life as an agnostics and later an atheist -- leads him to write a book inspired by  the Holy Spirit,  that will touch your soul in ways that few books will ever do;  A book that will examine your own life biases and forever impact the way you look at money, poverty, religion, immigration politics, science and business and it will also test and examine your own faith - or lack of faith- if you are a skeptic and even more powerfully, if you don’t believe in God; because you consider yourself an Agnostic or an Atheist.

The author chronicles in this book the metamorphosis he experienced, which are invaluable lessons that we can all apply to our own lives, because he was guided and inspired by God to write this book and was enlightened with wisdom, warnings, prophecies, messages about Islam, revelations that were written in the bible over three thousand years ago that were Prophecies of currents social events, that occurred just a few months ago with the supreme court of justice, and many more messages.

I addition  a new humane way to do businesses to aid the extreme poverty that afflicts the nation of Nicaragua, which is about to be infested by modern pirates that will decimate the poor and force them out of their land; as Nicaragua is facing an irrefutable potential devastation of the land as result of a geopolitical war developing in that small nation, due to a unconstitutional dictator that  has illegally given away the patrimony and decided  – unilaterally- to give up the sovereignty of a nation to a Chinese businessman with close ties to the republic of china and they  intend to build a Mega Canal to supplant the Panama canal, that project will cause irreparable damages beyond anyone’s  imagination if permitted; damages that could have consequences well beyond the borders of the poor nation of Nicaragua. But God in his divine wisdom has chosen to intervene and will utilize this book, to tell the story of Nicaragua to the world to stop this travesty from taking place.

-  Nicaragua is a blinded and deluded deprived nation; with plausible desires and expectations for a better future and because of it ; they area being grossly misled into destruction.

What I Need & What You Get

I'm attempting to raise funds to help me publish this book in two languages; all the money raised in this campaign will be utilized to pay for the cost of publishing the books. In addition; all cash generated by the sales of the books, will be donated to this cause, through a non-profit organization that comes along with the book.

•I wish I could get you excited! and  give this book away for free to anyone that helps me -- and the entire world if I could --  But  as you can see ...I'm  struggling financially and can't  afford the cost of publishing it.  I have paid a partial amount, but I need help to complete the process. This book is amazing -- and I mention it with the outmost humility of heart, because is really not mine, I'm merely the messenger-- and it must be published, so would you please help me and become a part of this story, because this book contains prophetic messages I received from The Lord  about many subjects including;  money, capitalism, socialism, immigration and  even business inspired by Him,  that could impact  the way the  world conducts business; and inspire others  to include the poor in the process. If you have ever wonder how to help the less fortunate, you will love reading this true story. 

•I hope to bring all lessons learned living in the United Sates with me to the town where I was born, please help me and become  a part of something very special, you can  become part of this inspirational story.

Greater love has no one than this, that one lay down his life for his friends.

•Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

•Please help me by spreading message if you can help me with a donation and share may plea for help, you can use the Indiegogo share tools! or any other means at your disposition like Facebook or other social media.

Thanks you and God bless you

story:
My Story and A North Pole Tale

I am Phoebe Godfrey, a sociologist who teaches courses at UCONN on Society and Climate Change, Sustainable Societies, Sociology of Food and Race/ Class and Gender.  I often use children's books in my classes as they can be very powerful ways of conveying, in simple terms,  highly profound messages. Currently there is no message more profound than the message of climate change and the need to change our values and practices. One of the central values and practices that we Americans need to change is consumption, and there is no holiday more dedicated to consumption than Christmas. Therefore, there is no person better suited to teach us new values and practices than Santa. 

After Christmas last year when I read that 2014 had been the hottest on record, (and now 2015 has exceeded it) I felt a deep desire to find a new way to reach people about the importance of changing our values and our consumer driven habits. This is the goal of this story -to invite adults and children to go on a magical journey of self and social discovery that returns us to the true meaning of giving.

A North Pole Tale has been written and revised numerous times and is in a final draft. However, what it now needs to make it come fully alive are illustrations like the ones shown here. Done by Fei Fei, a former UCONN student of mine, now an illustrator working in China, (where she is originally from) Fei Fei has the skills and vision to make this book truly beautiful.  Yet to do so, requires a fair amount of time and I would like to honor her work by compensating her.  Additionally, once it is illustrated, we need to have funds to self-publish it to make sure people will be able to read and learn from its wisdom.  This is where YOU come in.  

But first let me share some of the story with you....

It was the day after Christmas and as he did every year a very tired Santa took a well deserved rest. This year he felt more tired than usual as he had delivered more toys than ever. "What was Christmas coming to?" he wondered, as it seemed to him to be more and more about 'getting things' and less and less about 'giving love' but he didn't know what he could do to change this, especially not today. For today was they day that he liked to do nothing but sit by his fire with his cat Kringle and finish all the cookies he had collected from children around the world while reading the paper. Feeling very relaxed and comfortable Santa was about to take a long winter’s nap when he saw a small article at the back of his paper The North Pole News that jolted him fully awake.  The headline read:

  “ Scientists Confirm : 2014 Hottest Year in Recorded Human History.” 

Once Santa connects the dots about climate change, remembering that his boots and even his sled were sinking in the permafrost, he realizes the one person with whom he must speak.


Now Santa had a secret that no one else alive but himself and the scientist he was going to see knew.  It was not a secret they had chosen not to disclose but that was just how it had happened, the way when you mean to say something but before you know it the moment has passed and it just remains unsaid.  This secret was that Santa had a half brother who like himself celebrated Christmas but whose mother was a member of the people called Inuit. Along with Santa and his elves the Inuit live in the North Pole, as well as in  Northern Canada and Alaska. Santa was much older than his brother and although they hadn’t spent much time together they had a deep connection that couldn’t be put into words.  In fact, this connection was a mystery to them both as the saw the world so differently  based on the different cultures in which they were raised.  It was this difference in perspective that Santa was hoping could now help him answer his question.  He had not seen his brother in some time but if anyone might have an insight he knew Akycha (that means Sun god) would, as he was a very smart man.

Giving Santa an Inuit half-brother opens the story to other ideas  such as Santa learning  lessons from his dreams 


and from going on a shamanic journey with a group of animals, including a Polar Bear.   

Santa may have traveled the globe but he had never met a polar bear and certainly had never been inside a cave with one.  So he was a little taken aback when he realized this bear could speak or at least if she wasn’t actually speaking he could still hear her words in his head.  “You’ve been waiting for me?”  Santa replied with confusion.  “Yes,”  she said “who else better to learn the wisdom I have to share than you?”  “I don’t know”  said Santa. “Until a few days ago my only role was to make and bring presents to the children of the world.  And then since learning about climate change everything has been getting very mysterious!”

 “Its only mysterious Santa because even though every year you fly above the earth you have yet to see the global picture.  You have only been seeing the parts.  Are you willing to see the whole?”  “I suppose so” said Santa pulling on his long white beard.  “Will you show me how?”  he inquired wondering if he’d be able to sit down as he was feeling a bit tired.  “Have a seat Santa”  she said motioning to  a comfortable looking rock .  “And here have some special hot mushroom tea.  You must be tired and thirsty from your long journey”  she added while handing him a large mug of warm liquid.  “Mushroom tea” thought Santa “how unpleasant” but he didn’t want to be rude so he took a sip.  The warm liquid was earthy tasting but pleasant and he could feel it helping him to relax.


Santa goes on a shamanic journey and when he comes to he realizes what he must do. .  However, most of the details don't come to him until he meets his half-brother's daughter - his niece, on his way back to his home.

“Santa”  she called out waving with one hand and holding her reigns with the other as she steered her sleigh to stop next to Santa.. “Its me Yakone”.  “Yakone.. may how you’ve grown.  What are you doing here all alone? “  asked Santa expressing his happiness to see her, as well as his confusion as to why she might have come.  “Atata (father) thought you might need someone to talk to- someone who is a kid…so he asked me to pay you a visit before you got home, as I know kids aren’t allowed to get too close”.  “Well, that’s true” said Santa “...but you’re not just any kid.  Do you want to follow me home?” 

  “I would but Atata asked me to get home before dark so I can only stay a little while.  How was your visit with Nanuk?”  Yakone asked. 

  “It very strange Yakone …I have learned so much about climate change that I now realize I know so little about myself” Santa explained.  “In fact, I have been left with a question I can’t answer- maybe you can help me?” 

  “What is it” Yakone asked her brown eyes looking bigger than usual.  “The question is how can I be Santa if I don’t make any toys, since toys take resources and the use of resources takes homes away from animals and contributes to climate change”  Santa explained. 

And so together they come up with an answer but the final full answer doesn't come until the end of the book.  And for that you will have to wait until the book is ready....

So what this book needs is for these sketches and more to become full color illustrations to bring it to life.

As with Santa's realization in the story that its not the gifts the children want so much but the connection with other people and beings, I too want to recognize that its not just the gifts you are giving that matters, but the connection to all of you which matters most of all. Whatever you can give we appreciate  as we know it comes from your hearts and from your desire to change our social story from 'planetary consumption' to 'community creation'.

What I Need & What You Get

Fei Fei, as mentioned, is willing and able to do the illustrations but as a young artist newly graduated from UCONN, she needs to be paid for her time.  I do not have the funds to pay her and so we thought we'd create this campaign to ask others like you to help support us.  We are committed to illustrating this book and self-publishing it--all of which needs to be funded.  We want Santa to become a climate change hero and for his connections to, and help from, the Inuit culture and their values to be known. 

This chart is an approximation of what it will cost us to make A North Pole Tale a reality. This would be a lot for just the two of us but if we all pitch in it can be very little  and yet accomplish much!


Depending on your level of support, you can get images from the book and even a signed copy or copies once we self-publish it.  You can see yourself as a patron of the arts and as a pioneer for addressing climate change.  Maybe you too have thought that the consumerism around Christmas needs to change and children need to get more of what really matters like time with family, nature and animals.  If so, then this would be a book you would enjoy reading and/or enjoy reading to/with your kids.  The news of climate change is hard to address with children but this book does so in a way that is heart and humor filled, while still presenting aspects of the truth. 

Risks & Challenges

The risks are minimal as the story is written and as you can see Fei Fei has been hard at work creating the images and doing research to make sure she gets all the meaningful details. Once all the images are done we will self-publish the book so it can be sold on Amazon and from our website (not yet built). We don't want to waste time looking for a publisher as the polar ice caps are melting and we want to get our story out there in time for next Christmas! All we need is the financial support from you and/or for you to spread the word. 

The Impact

This year, 2015, will be the new hottest year on record.  The ice caps are melting faster than predicted and the permafrost in the Arctic is also melting.  Animals are going extinct and the forests of the world are being cut down at alarming rates. We need a radical shift in our values in terms of teaching our children that there many more important things in the world than 'things'.  A North Pole Tale  invites adults and children to explore how to be part of changing our culture story by first reading, then  sharing and ultimately putting into practice this heartwarming and magical Christmas climate change story.

Other Ways You Can Help

Once the book is available for purchase we will invite everyone who contributed to help spread the word.  All it takes is each one to tell someone and, like ice crystals, our and your impact will grow. Help us reclaim, as Santa learns, the power of the gift that is about giving of ourselves from our hearts, not that which destroys life on Earth.

story:
This campaign is about raising funds for the production and distribution costs of a chapbook, Stone, to be published by Atlantic Press Books in March 2016, written by Em Strang and illustrated by Mat Osmond.

'Stone' is a mythopoetic narrative poem set in an imaginary post-collapse world. It explores the life of a man who has taken to the hills, not as a gung-ho survivalist, but as someone trying to understand what it means to be human in a world 'where there are more animals than men'. If stories seed us, the poem asks, why is it we persist in sowing and tending toxic ones? 

Making Stone is about creating something physically beautiful, thought-provoking and nourishing. The poem and its illustrations explore what it means to feel our way in the dark, whilst holding out for the light - something that is becoming more and more necessary in these times of ecocide, terrorism and climate change.

Em Strang is a poet, Creative Writing tutor and Dark Mountain poetry editor. She has recently completed a PhD in Creative Writing (ecological poetry) at the University of Glasgow, and now teaches Creative Writing and Creative Reading in Scottish prisons. She has published widely in anthologies and journals, and two of her poems were shortlisted in the Bridport Prize 2014. Her writing preoccupations are with 'nature' (birds feature in almost all her poems) and the relationship between the human and nonhuman.  Her first collection of poetry, Bird-Woman, is coming out with Shearsman in September 2016.

Em's website

Mat Osmond, winner of the 2015 Michael Marks Award for Poetry Pamphlet Illustration, works as an illustrator and poet, publishing his work chiefly through the small press Strandline Books and Dark Mountain. Mat works as Senior Lecturer on the MA Illustration: Authorial Practice at Falmouth University, and was employed on its sister award, the MA Art and Environemnt, during its five year existence. He's part of the R.A.N.E. (Research into Art and the Natural Environment) research group based a Schumacher College, Devon. The questions that absorb him, both as artist and essayist, concern what the arts most valuably offer us, as we stand before the hole that grows under our dying culture, and way of life. 

As well as working with Em on Stone, Mat's currently producing a new Strandline Books volume ofdeadman and hare poems, and two new essays: one about Ted Hughes' and Leonard Baskin's Crow, and one about the personification of the sacred feminine within the work of Meinrad Craighead.

Mat's website

Money raised by this crowd fund will go directly to Atlantic Press to produce an initial print run of the book. Once we've paid Atlantic Press production & distribution costs, 100% of the remaining income will go directly to Trees For Life, an award-winning Scottish charity. 

"The core purpose and vision of Trees for Life is to restore the Caledonian Forest and all its constituent species of flora and fauna to the Scottish Highlands."

So if you pledge money to this campaign, not only will you receive a beautiful book, but you'll also be helping to plant trees - what's not to like! 

As well as pre-orders of the double-signed book, we're also offering a number of fantastic perks:

  • A giclee print of Mat's image 'Stone'. B&W giclee print on cotton rag paper; a signed and numbered limited edition of 14.


  • A giclee print of Mat's image, 'Stone Triptych'. B&W giclee print on cotton rag paper; a signed and numbered limited edition of 14.



  • Illustration tuition with Mat Osmond
Mat will offer up to three pledgers the chance to work with him on their self-authored illustrational projects. Unless pledgers would like to come to Falmouth to meet in person, tuition will take place via two rounds of emailed (and/or Skype) feedback, during the second half of 2016. Mat will offer feedback and suggestions on draft work submitted by email as PDF at least two weeks before each session.

  • Creative Writing tuition with Em Strang
Em will offer up to three pledgers the chance to work with her on three poems (up to 40 lines each) or 2000 words of prose. Tuition will take place via email (and/or Skype) and will include inline comments as well as detailed written feedback. Tuition will take place in 2016, dates to be arranged by mutual agreement. 

If we don't reach our funding target, we'll have to think of other ways to raise the shortfall. Not reaching our target will not mean canceling the campaign and will not affect any pledges already made.
We hope you agree that this is an exciting and worthwhile project, bringing together words and images to make a unique and visually stunning book.
It’s the smoothest oval stone I’ve ever seen,
and sits perfect in my palm like a plum.
I turn it over, relish its surface,
try to unpack its minerals, but I can’t.
A kind of granite? Feldspar?
The stone stares back.
Please do spread the word and share this campaign with friends. Any help in reaching our goal is much appreciated!

story:
Hi,

I have just started writing a book. Now on page 47.
I have changed the title two times, and am about to change it again to INCOMPLETE.

My pseudonym is John Smith. The book started as
some random statements, but is now starting to go somewhere.

My funding request primarily serves the purpose of my
physical survival, but is also a test to see if there is a
chance I actually will get published.

If you like me to write more, and change the title to
COMPLETE, choose an upvote perk.

If you hate it, choose a downvote perk.

If you want to be heard, there is a perk for that too.

Goes without saying that every contributor will receive a signed copy
when my book gets published.

So without further ado here are the first 47 pages:
------------------------------------------------------------------

THE PURSUIT OF HAPPINESS.

MINDGAMES

If a mosquito transporting hemoragic dengue fever stings me, but I kill it slapping
him right after the sting, who has won, if anybody?

First of all, to be able to decide on 'winning', 'losing' or a 'draw', there must be
a game with criteria or rules, and players. The players must also be aware of the rules
before playing. And we need a referee, to interpret the 'facts' to declare a result.

Secondly we need an audience, preferrably partial, to create the illusion that this
game has any meaning.

Thirdly we need a beginning and an end. Without a beginning we would not know when the rules
are in effect. Without an end we would not come to a result.

In my mosquito example, all of the above is missing, which would logically lead to a
statement like 'life is not a game' or 'life has no meaning'.
When I lay there bleeding out from the dengue fever however, I have a strong sense that the
mosquito has won.

So why is that? Why do I have this feeling that there was a game going on, of which I and the mosquito
knew the rules al along, and the mosquito just outsmarted me.
And even with him dying in the process he still won.

Could it be that I felt superior to the mosquito, because I assumed that I was smarter?
And if so, why did I assume I was smarter?

In a note to the reader I warn you that this lecture has no meaning at all, that it does not have
a beginning, neither an end, that it will not give you any answers and will give you a lot of answers at the same time,
that it will make you a either a zelot, an anarchist or yourself.

Back to my feeling of defeat.
I feel defeat in a game. So what were the rules?

He was allowed to sting me for food - my blood - since I have a ton of it
compared to his needs, but he was not allowed to infect me with deadly dengue fever.
Or was he?
If he was, that could mean a rule of this game is 'you die, you lose'.
Then it would be a draw, since we both are dead.

Since I don't feel it is a draw, it must be that he was not allowed to infect me.

He broke the rule, so let's go to the referee. The referee states that I have won, according
to the rules 'whoever breaks the rules loses' and 'the game ends when we have a winner'.

No didn't help. I still feel like a loser, and I feel betrayed. I need to go to a higher authority.
The guilty must be punished. But the mosquito is already declared 'loser' by the referree. Furthermore he is dead.
Nothing left to punish.

The result appears to have no meaning. Does that mean there was no game to begin with?
Or does it mean that the rules have no bearing on and connection with reality?
Again, the definition of a game.

Oh, I get it now. It must be that I want it to be a game, so I can start over.

Sounds familiar, doesn't it.
Comforting even.

Why does this happen to me? Who did this to me? Who is to blame for me losing the game?

Yep, I feel it coming. Wild anger and rage.
After ten seconds (my father tought me to count to ten whenever my emotions threaten to get me
breaking the rules), my rationalization kicks in: 'I screwed up. I did't kill off al the dengue mosquitos
in a pre-emptive strike'. 'The mosquito can't help it that he is carrying the dengue fever. He didn't even know it'

Noo. Superiority again. Can you prove the mosquito has no knowledge of dengue fever? For all you know they
are best friends, teaming up to kill off this human in a pre-emptive strike.

Yeah, sure. Smart mosquito's and smart viusses, conspiring together to nail you. Little paranoia, don't you think?
Well, it wouldn't be paranoid if it were true.

OK. Let's explore it. Dengue mosquito's find small pools of water everywhere to procreate. How do they do that? Can they
smell water? And if so, is that a sign of intelligence?
At least one meaning of the word intelligence certainly covers it.
Being able to find weapons of mass destruction in some desert or on some island is considered to be intelligent. So much even
that there is an Agency for it in existance.

I'll run with that. I state that dengue mosquito's are intelligent, and therefore have the capability to team up with
the dengue fever virus to launch a pre-emptive strike against humans, their main enemy.

What about the dengue virus. Is that intelligent? Could it even be calling the shots?
Why does it even exist? Is it aware there is a game going on, and does it play by it's rules?

That word again. 'Why'.  So difficult to answer. Much more difficult than 'Where', 'How', 'When', 'What'.
Seems that the latter four are a result of the first one. Moreeven, the latter four seem not to
exist without the first one. And they are of different cardinality. For one 'Why' can exist
multiple 'How`s', for one 'How' can exist multiple 'Where`s' , for one 'Where' can exist multiple
