story:
A beautifully designed 368-page novel only for the Indiegogo backer community, coming this September, ahead of its October release. Crafted for readers who love vampires, romance and fantasy as well as for readers who enjoy an exciting, new novel. Read sample chapters here.

I like vampire novels, but was hungry for something that would breathe new life into the vampire genre so popular all over the world. But the years went by, and nothing emerged.

As a successful and ambitious author, that sounded like a call to action. As a Cambodian-American, I was moved to write a different kind of vampire story, a fresh and new one, that would bring ancient Asian vampire mythology and customs into the dramas of the modern world, and abandon the tired old Western versions that have dominated movies and literature for the last hundred years.

When a traditional Asian vampire flies, nothing is seen but a glowing head with internal organs dangling below. But my vampires break even that mold. They are translucent, wild and spellbinding, and drip with dark mystery and spirituality. The invasion of the original Asian vampires is long overdue! Get real! 60% of the world’s population, or 4.3 billion people, are Asian. And not one 21st-century Asian vampire?

On June 29, 2013, I pitched my Asian vampire concept, Rise of the Golden Aura, to the California Institute of Contemporary Arts. They were so excited that they awarded me a grant to write it the very next day. Later, they additionally funded my trip to Cambodia, where I researched ancient Khmer sites, such as the Bayon Temple. They even paid for a helicopter flyover of Angkor Wat, the largest religious temple complex in the world, so I could feel what it’s like for my vampires to return to home base.

For the next three years, I poured my heart and soul into the novel. Emerging from it all, exhausted but fulfilled, I realized I had an inspirational vampire tale unlike any other, bursting from its pages to thrill and entertain readers everywhere.

It was time for the next step. Inspired by my publisher W.W. Norton’s rags to riches story, the indie author movement and Shark Tank (ABC’s #1 Hit TV Show), my childhood entrepreneurial spirit was rekindled. My literary agent had previously sold my award-winning memoir, When Broken Glass Floats: Growing Up Under the Khmer Rouge, to W.W. Norton.  But this time, I would strike off on my own. On October 16, 2015, I established Moon Power Media, an independent book publisher, to publish Rise of the Golden Aura, future books in the series, and other independent literary ventures.

I've taken this path because becoming an independent publisher is important to me. It allows me to retain my artistic direction, improve my income, and market books in ways better suited to their target audience.

 

Additionally, the success of this campaign will one day help me establish a branch of Moon Power Media in Cambodia, a country without a professional publisher since its destruction in the 70s by the Khmer Rouge and other governments.  With your support, I hope to help rebuild Cambodia’s publishing industry.

Viewed in the light of the present and the past history of our world, my new book is a unique mix of family and friendship values, redemption, the struggles of PTSD by war survivors, leadership, humor, and Khmer legend and actual world events. As author and reviewer Justin Wintle said, Rise of the Golden Aura is “. . . exactly the sort of fusion fiction our global village needs.”

A blind man’s vision: an ancient royalty reincarnates as a supernatural queen whose golden aura is visible only to the spirit world.

JD Bophatip, abandoned as a baby in Cambodia, grew up in America. Now seventeen, JD enters the Queen of Rosaria competition–a life-changing decision.

Enter Ryker Erickson: charming, enigmatic and irresistible. Drawn to JD, he’s captivated by her glowing aura. He’s not the only one.

Ryker’s family, a powerful vampire clan, has a prophecy of their own: a golden queen will rule the vampire underworld. While Ryker falls for JD, his clan plots her destruction.

In dreams, JD has potent prophetic visions. What is the link to a mysterious gift of Sanskrit inscriptions and sacred jewels? Can she harness her emerging powers in time to fulfill her destiny and save her life?

First in an exciting new series, Rise of the Golden Aura, blends myth, folklore, suspense, loyalty and love.

Hello. I’m Chanrithy Him, a child survivor of the Khmer Rouge genocide. Since then, I’ve gone on to become an international speaker, Khmer classical dancer and author of the widely acclaimed, award-winning, When Broken Glass Floats: Growing Up Under the Khmer Rouge (W.W. Norton).

I was featured with Archbishop Desmond Tutu and Dr. Juan Alemendares of Honduras in the film, The Will To Live.  I am profiled in the book, Voices of Protest, alongside such world figures such as Martin Luther King, Mohandas Gandhi, and Nelson Mandela.

On January 26, 2017, my life story was highlighted along with author Elie Wiesel’s, the 1986 Nobel Peace Prize winner, at the Holocaust Memorial Day 2017 UK Commemorative Ceremony, where audiences considered the theme: How Can Life Go On?

Life CAN and DOES go on for survivors like me (especially those plotting, as I am, shh!, to take over the Daily Show.  Watch out, Trevor Noah!). Storytelling is my passion, one I inherited from my beloved mother, Mak, whom I lost under the Khmer Rouge.

1. FIRST EDITION OF RISE OF THE GOLDEN AURA IS AVAILABLE IN E-BOOK & HARDCOVER!

Photo by Dy Leng

2. THE STUNNING BOOK COVER POSTER IS SMILING AT YOU!

 

3. THE AUTOGRAPHED MUG, WITH THE BEAUTIFUL BOOK COVER DESIGN OF QUEEN JD! ​

4. THE PAPERBACK EDITION OF THE INTERNATIONALLY ACCLAIMED, AWARD-WINNING MEMOIR, WHEN BROKEN GLASS FLOATS: GROWING UP UNDER THE KHMER ROUGE!

WHEN YOU ARE READY TO SELECT YOUR REWARDS, PLEASE GO TO THE TOP RIGHT COLUMN FOR MORE EXCITING PERK OPTIONS. ​

Why this campaign?

Rise of the Golden Aura is all dressed up and ready to go into production. But first, I need the funds to promote it.  With your support, I can hire a publicist to help me make a big publicity splash in the media here in America and overseas, and fund the costs of distribution setup.

If I am fortunate enough to exceed my funding goal, I can fund NetGalley, a book tour and an advertising campaign. Interacting with readers at book signings, and reading at bookstores, libraries, high schools and universities, adds buzz and excitement, and is of terrific promotional value. I witnessed this when W.W. Norton sent me on a book tour in April 2000 to promote my memoir, When Broken Glass Floats.  The effect was electric.

Your backing will help me make history by bringing my original Asian vampires to Western literature and to 4.3 billion Asians worldwide. This is my dream for my baby, and with your support, that dream will be born.

I'm very excited about the story I've told.  Not only is it a refreshing new take on the genre, with vampire physiology, customs, and culture unfamiliar to the Western world, but it provides a glimpse into life from the Asian perspective, and into the struggles of the millions of those born in the US to native Asian parents, living with one foot in the new world and one foot in the old.

The history of Asia has been quite different from the West.  Basic values and outlooks have remained unchanged for thousands of years, as has Asia's history of war, genocide, oppression and conflict.  Youth grow up with a different worldview and values, one in which hard work and self-deprivation equate with self-worth, and family and elders are life's greatest motivation.

My own culture and values carried me through my childhood years as a captive slave under the brutal Khmer Rouge regime, and through the loss of my beloved brothers, sisters, and parents, one by one. They allowed me to come to the US as a 16-year-old teenager with my spirit battered but unbroken, and to go forward into life with an ethic of hard work, accomplishment, family values, and respect for others.

As an Asian-American author, I saw a lack of literature featuring the struggles of Asian youth: young adults attempting to succeed in the modern world with ancient values, struggling to help their family, honor their elders and not disgrace their ancestors, and to put hard work and dedication above personal pleasure.  It's a fascinating world if you haven't been there, and I wanted to give Westerners a glimpse into it.

I wrote Rise of the Golden Aura to make an impact.  By contrast to other YA literature, JD Bophatip, the hero of my novel, is an Asian teen of substance, on her way to becoming a great leader.  Abandoned as a child, and struggling to adapt to life in a new world, she learns that she is targeted for destruction by terrifying supernatural forces of darkness.  As these powers begin to envelop her, she discovers secret strengths sleeping within,  that allow her to confront, battle, and ultimately triumph over hate and evil.  JD is a young woman fighting to be all she can be. JD’s life is joyful, meaningful, and important.

Aside from wanting to bring forth an original and exotic vampire novel, I wrote Rise of the Golden Aura to provide inspiration and empowerment to young people of all languages and cultures. Its theme and its appeal are eternal: a young girl awakens to the strength and destiny lying within her, rises to battle overwhelming forces with nothing but her strength of character, and emerges into adulthood victorious.

I hope that you will join me in my dream to spread the word of empowerment, adventurousness, self-confidence and positive values to our young people everywhere.

The risk is behind me.  I took the risk when I invested 3 years of my life into writing this book.  All that remains now is THE CHALLENGE: to win your support.  With your funding, this book WILL succeed.  Where’s the risk?  To succeed, a book must be a great story, and get effective promotion.  I proved that I can write a great story with the success of my memoir, the internationally acclaimed and award-winning When Broken Glass Floats. I’ve shown that I can promote by rising from a parentless child immigrant to a voice of importance in the US and worldwide.  I mentioned some examples of that in the “About the Author” section. Can I successfully PROMOTE this book with your funding?  Well, consider my previous promotional accomplishments:

As a child survivor, author and international speaker, my words have been heard on the BBC, Al Jazeera, the Voice of America, Cambodian National TV, Australian radio and TV, and U.S. radio and television. I have been featured as the keynote speaker at lecture halls in the U.S., Australia, Cambodia, Canada and Denmark.

In 2004 I received a personal thank-you letter from Secretary of State Madeleine Albright for "giving voice to those who have none."  In it, she reflected, "Dear Ms. Him . . . Thank you so much for sharing [When Broken Glass Floats] with me and the world . . . Courageous individuals such as yourself help give voice to those who have none and remind us of our obligations to humanity . . . You are an inspiring woman."

In April 2000, Justin Wintle, author of Perfect Hostage: A Life of Aung San Suu Kyi : gave my memoir, When Broken Glass Floats, a glowing review in the (London) Sunday Times.  In 2016, upon reading an advance reader copy of Rise of the Golden Aura, he summarized it as follows: "Greatly entertaining . . . high fantasy, vampirism and romance . . . exactly the sort of fusion fiction our global village needs."

On April 17, 2000, Kirkus Reviews enthusiastically reviewed my memoir When Broken Glass Floats: “A worthy and compelling debut . . . to open the past and avenge the victims of the Khmer Rouge . . . a simply told, yet inspirational memoir about the reign of the Khmer Rouge, that helps to shed light on the plight of the Cambodian people.”  In 2016, after reading Rise of the Golden Aura, Kirkus Reviews held two more thumbs-up:  “Him tells the least traditional vampire tale . . . the vampire (or ‘arb’) imagery from Cambodian lore can be astonishing . . . an uplifting tale of a teenager championing two cultures . . . a slice-of-life YA novel."

In 2016, after reading an advance reader copy of Rise of the Golden Aura, Princess Soma Norodom of Cambodia, author of Royal Rebel, remarked: “. . . so riveting . . . The love story between JD and Ryker was so beautiful . . . I'm ready for the second book."  

Professional reviewers have given this novel a “go”.  I’ve proven that I have skills to promote it.  Where’s the risk? All this book needs is YOUR FUNDING to go forth into the world and prosper.

Maybe you can’t afford a perk, but would like to help.  Please spread the word about this campaign on Twitter, Facebook, Tumblr, Instagram, and LinkedIn, and by e-mailing the campaign link to friends and family. You can use Indiegogo’s share tools to do this, or simply cut and paste the website url into your email.

I’m so very excited to share Rise of the Golden Aura with you! In addition to being an exciting new entry into the vampire genre, it has a beautiful book cover, and an elegant interior design by a wonderful artist and friend, Rachel Lawston, in London. It’s done and ready to go to print! Please help me bring my new baby to life by CONTRIBUTING!

In closing, thank you from the bottom of my heart for your consideration, your support, and your interest in helping me to inspire and empower our global village!

Saum​ preah​ bratan​ po​ nak!  (May God bless you!)

Chanrithy Him

You are an inspiring woman."In April 2000, Justin Wintle, author of Perfect Hostage: A Life of Aung San Suu Kyi : gave my memoir, When Broken Glass Floats, a glowing review in the (London) Sunday Times.  In 2016, upon reading an advance reader copy of Rise of the Golden Aura, he summarized it as follows: "Greatly entertaining . . . high fantasy, vampirism and romance . . . exactly the sort of fusion fiction our global village needs."On April 17, 2000, Kirkus Reviews enthusiastically reviewed my memoir When Broken Glass Floats: “A worthy and compelling debut . . . to open the past and avenge the victims of the Khmer Rouge . . . a simply told, yet inspirational memoir about the reign of the Khmer Rouge, that helps to shed light on the plight of the Cambodian people.”  In 2016, after reading Rise of the Golden Aura, Kirkus Reviews held two more thumbs-up:  “Him tells the least traditional vampire tale . . . the vampire (or ‘arb’) imagery from Cambodian lore can be astonishing . . . an uplifting tale of a teenager championing two cultures . . . a slice-of-life YA novel."In 2016, after reading an advance reader copy of Rise of the Golden Aura, Princess Soma Norodom of Cambodia, author of Royal Rebel, remarked: “. . . so riveting . . . The love story between JD and Ryker was so beautiful . . . I'm ready for the second book."  Professional reviewers have given this novel a “go”.  I’ve proven that I have skills to promote it.  Where’s the risk? All this book needs is YOUR FUNDING to go forth into the world and prosper.Maybe you can’t afford a perk, but would like to help.  Please spread the word about this campaign on Twitter, Facebook, Tumblr, Instagram, and LinkedIn, and by e-mailing the campaign link to friends and family. You can use Indiegogo’s share tools to do this, or simply cut and paste the website url into your email.I’m so very excited to share Rise of the Golden Aura with you! In addition to being an exciting new entry into the vampire genre, it has a beautiful book cover, and an elegant interior design by a wonderful artist and friend, Rachel Lawston, in London. It’s done and ready to go to print! Please help me bring my new baby to life by CONTRIBUTING!In closing, thank you from the bottom of my heart for your consideration, your support, and your interest in helping me to inspire and empower our global village!Saum​ preah​ bratan​ po​ nak!  (May God bless you!)Chanrithy Him

story:
About the author

Hello everybody! My name is Cristian Vitali. I am an Italian writer and the author of the epic fantasy saga “The Song of the Mountains”. It is a work in five volumes, three of which have already been self- published here, in Italy, through the StreetLib platform.

 

The translation project

Why launching into a crowdfunding campaign to translate an Italian book into English? Simply because, after the book has had a great success here in Italy with thousands of copies sold, I thought it was a good thing to make it available also for the English speaking readers. Around here, they have the reputation of being real expert in fantastic narration. I would feel honoured to know their opinion on my first work “The Song of the Mountains - The shadow of the conspiracy”.

 

The originality of “The Song of the Mountains”

An unusual main character

I admit I do not have a clear view of what the English- speaking world thinks of Italian fantasy in general, but I am sure that the real lovers of this literary genre can appreciate the great stories, marked by a classic epic style, and at the same time enriched with originality. For example, one of the main characters will be a Dwarf. In most of the stories Dwarves are downgraded to simple helpers of the real protagonists. They sometimes look clumsy or their task is that of putting their friends in a good mood. Ah! I would like you to know Nòrys, the Dwarf, son of Rurys, from the Kingdom of Nèvos-Harx, maybe angry, holding his war hammer and wearing his Rock of Nìnir armour!

 

The setting

The Sunny Lands of Merìdia

Be ready to travel in the verdant and medieval world of Merìdia, made alive by the realistic descriptions of exciting landscapes awaiting in a mystical enchantment, almost torn from another Era. Expressly for the landscapes, I have developed a writing style that I would define as “cinematographic in 4D”. It enables the readers to place themselves in the described situation, so that they almost feel part of it and they can experience the scents and the peculiar climatic sensations.

 

The antagonists

The dark side of Merìdia

Since the beginning of the story, you will have the dangerous Arcanums to reckon with. They are skilful handlers of a primordial witchcraft, pitiless servants of an ancient power. They are capable of restraining and un-restraining the force of the four elements and of the evil energies, while the shadow of the mysterious Devourers will hang over the whole narration. Many more enemies will reveal themselves in the course of the saga and they will make your heart beat quicker!

 

A “redeemed” race

The Orcs

There are interesting news even about the Orcs. Here they are not described as an evil race, but as people like the others, with merits and shortcomings. They are forgotten guardians of a dreadful secret.

 

About the story

 

"I see it -Terror, the greatest  of any terror-

I can see it with my eyes:

the Impassable Gash wasn't closed yet

the bridges are still extended

the Devourers, while sleeping, await

and the revenge lies buried with them, as it was said".

The story is interwoven with the violent developments of a conspiracy, which gives the title to the first volume. A sect of conspirators brings the world of Merìdia to its knees and it is determined to get the only thing it craves for: a very ancient artefact the Diadem of Mit-Ulliand, through which is possible to rouse the Devourers' wildness and cruelty. Unexpected events are assured, magic duels, epic fights, terrifying monsters will upset the adventures of the main characters, making really hard the journey of Nòrys’s brave fellowship.

You certainly will not miss love stories and longing relationships among the characters, who are all described psychologically and physically. “The shadow of the conspiracy” will make you enter the magic world of Merìdia, among Dwarves, Elves, Fairies, Orcs, crystal cities and dark underground fortresses. It will put you face to face with magnificent creatures and ghastly monsters, ranging you in the lines of shining armies and tenebrous hordes.

“The Song of the Mountains.” is also this. It is the fantasy book you were waiting for!

 

A successful saga

The numbers in Amazon and Kobo bestseller lists

As I mentioned at the beginning, “The Song of the Mountains” has met a great success in Italy, fascinating many readers, attaining even a lot of those who had never approached the fantasy genre.

The following are only some of the best results:

#1° Fantasy (Kobo)

#1° Epic Fantasy (Kobo)

#1° Action and adventure for teens and young adults (Kobo)

#1° Christian Fantasy (Amazon)

#1° Fantasy – Anthologies (Amazon)

#1° Religious and spiritual fiction (Amazon)

#1° Religious and spiritual fiction for teens and young adults (Amazon)

#2° Action and adventure (Amazon)

#2° Action and adventure for teens and young adults (Amazon)

#3° Action literature (Kobo)

#3° Epic fantasy (Amazon)

#4° Myths, sagas and legends (Amazon)

#5° Fantasy (Amazon)

#6° Fantasy – the most interesting novelties (Amazon)

Top 50 – Fantasy for teens and young adults ( Kobo)

#168° On the WHOLE Kindle Store catalogue (Amazon)

 

The reviews

The readers’ opinion

I want to say first of all, that in Italy the digital readers are a minority if compared to other Countries, and as a consequence also the reviewers. Let me use this term of comparison to show you what our present situation is: “The Lord of the Rings” has 312 reviews on Amazon.it, while there are 19,042 of them on Amazon.com!

Now let’s go back to the reviews of my book:

 

“The Song of the Mountains – The shadow of the conspiracy”

(117 reviews, average 4.6 stars out of 5, on Amazon.it)

 

This book has only the title in English now, but after the end of the campaign, we are sure we will have also the translation of the book!

 

A book with the soundtrack

A musical composition in a CD by “Age Of Chronicles Music Productions”

When a book succeeds in inspiring emotions, why do not listen to its CD? In 11 emotional tracks (10 instrumental and choral, plus one performed in English), “Age Of Chronicles” have been able to tell the story of the first volume of the saga, transforming it into music of very high epic quality! The background music of this video is from their album.

 

The campaign goal

It is to cover the costs of the translation into English and the publication of “The Song of the Mountains – The shadow of the conspiracy”. Everybody knows that translating books is not an easy job and that it takes a long time, especially when it is carried out with professional competence and attention. After several attempts, my team and I have found the right person for this task. We need to raise - 6000 $ to pay his long work. Then for the printing of the first run of the English copies, we need other 3000 $ , including international shipping. 

I have decided to choose the’ Flexible Funding’ option and if some money is left or I receive more funds, all of it will go to the translation of the second volume of the saga. To reward your contributions, I'll send you rich perks.

 

Perks

Gifts for the supporters

I have studied a wide range of perks, to excite your love for fantasy novels, and I’m sure this will urge you to back this project. According to the typology of contribution that you choose, you will receive:

1$ Personal thank-you email: you will see it is from Nòrys, the Dwarf himself!

 

5$ Public personal thank-you shout-out on “The Song of the Mountains” Facebook page ( over 16,000 likes).

 

8$ Two personalized bookmarks of the first volume, with my autograph.

 

10$ Thank-you video on “The Song of the Mountains” Facebook page (over 16,000 likes). To be precise, I will thank you wearing a uniform like the one of the Guard of Minas Tirith Fountain!

12$ The map of Merìdia world, with my autograph.

 

50$ A copy of the book in English with my autograph, as soon as they will be available, in addition the bookmarks and the Merìdia map with my autograph.

 

50$ A CD with the soundtrack by “Age of Chronicles” based on “The shadow of the conspiracy” with the composers’ autographs. In addition the bookmarks and the Merìdia map with my autograph.

 

GOLDEN PERKS:

 

100$ A poem written to honour you on the saga official site, always visible in a provided section. It will be up to you to choose the Merìdia bard who will immortalize you in this glorious narrative poem! Elves? Orcs? Dwarves? Enchanted People? Men?

 

200$ Your name printed in the final acknowledgements of the book, with a personalized poetic dedication in fantasy style. According to your preferences your name will be sung by Elves, Dwarves, Orcs, Enchanted People or Men. It will appear both in the English version and in the next reprint of the Italian one. In addition, you will receive the book, the bookmarks and the map with my autograph, as well as the CD of the soundtrack with the composers’ dedication and autographs.

 

250$ ( limited to 10 ) This is a special perk because it gives you the opportunity of entering the very world of Merìdia. In fact, you will be a character who will be mentioned in a new short story. I'll write and publish it at the end of this campaign. For your character in the story, you can choose the race (Men, Dwarves, Elves, Orcs and Enchanted People); the class character (warrior, knight, spy, cleric...). Then I need your name, if necessary it will be adapted to the setting; some traits of the personality (cheerful, gruff, braggart, pessimistic, optimistic...) and some physical details (long or short hair, build, height...). Do not forget that also who appears as an extra can upset the protagonist's adventure!

 

500$ (limited to 15) And in the end “cherry on the cake”, A SPECIAL SURPRISE! I want you to take part in the very world of Merìdia, you, yourself as a main character of a new short story, that I’ll write and publish at the end of this campaign. You can choose which race to belong to: Men, Dwarves, Elves, Orcs and Enchanted People, and also the character class: a warrior, a knight, a spy, a cleric...; It will be something like the background for a role-play game. I also need your name and if necessary it will be adapted to the setting; some traits of your personality in this story (cheerful, gruff, braggart, pessimistic, optimistic…), and some physical details ( long or short hair, build, height…etc.). Then I will devote myself to write this story where you will be the protagonists who enter the fantasy world of Merìdia, forever and concretely.

This is a unique chance! DON’T MISS IT!

 

 

HERE YOU ARE!! Thanks for having devoted ALL THIS TIME to me. I hope I have roused your interest in the exploration of the vast lands of Merìdia ! For any question, you can write here on the campaign page, or directly to me at this address norysilnano@libero.it. I will be glad to reply to you!

 

A BIG HUG TO YOU ALL!

In all friendship and gratitude,

Cristian.

story:
English Version at the bottom of the page

Was ist Non-Duality?

Mehr Videos gibt es unten auf der Seite.
 

Was ist das einzigartige an diesem Projekt

  • Es ist das einzige Non-Duality Tarot- und Orakelkarten Set auf dem Markt.
  • Es ist die einzigartige Kombination von einem Tarot- und Orakelkarten Set, welches gleichzeitig auch als Einführungskurs in Non-Duality genutzt werden kann.
  • Das Set wird mit einem geführten Online-Kurs ergänzt, der mit multimedialen Inhalten das Thema noch vertieft. 
  • Im Online-Kurs gibt es zu jeder Karte zwei Videos (je zirka 10- 15 Minuten Dauer) 
    • einmal mit angeleiteten Kontemplationen, - die aus Fragen zur Selbsterforschung bestehen - und
    • auf das Thema der Karte zugeschnittene und angeleitete Meditationen.

Warum ich dieses Projekt mache

Mich fasziniert an Non-Duality, dass es

  • mir schnell und effizient ermöglicht mich mit mir selbst zu verbinden.
  • mir eine völlig neue Weltsicht eröffnet hat. Weg vom materialistischen, nach aussen gerichteten, hinzu einem geistigen, nach innen gerichteten, Weltbild.
  • nicht sektiererisch, sondern säkular ist. 

Ich möchte Non-Duality mehr Menschen zugänglich machen, weil es ist genau die Philosophie und Methode ist, welche es in unserer heutigen Zeit braucht.

Deine Beteiligung hilft

  • Non-Duality bekannter zu machen.
  • Nutzern des Tarot / Kurses eine
    • einfache und direkte Meditationstechnik zur Verfügung zu stellen, um zu sich selbst zu finden.
    • mehr Selbstverantwortung zu erfahren.
    • eine Schritt für Schritt Anleitung zu einem erfüllteren Leben zu bekommen.
  • ein Weltbild zu verbreiten, welches unserem kapitalistisch / materialistisch geprägten, leidverursachenden Gesellschaftssystem, etwas alternatives entgegensetzt.
  • eine nicht sektiererische und weltliche Philosophie zu verbreiten.
  • insbesonders dann, wenn du
    • das Projekt  weiterempfiehlst und es via E-Mail oder deinen Sozialen Medien teilst.
    • dich auf www.nonduality-tarot.com in die Mailingliste einträgst, um Updates zu bekommen. 

 

Für wen ist Non-Duality?

Für alle, die

  • eine zeitgemässe Philosophie oder Weltanschauung, bzw. eine effiziente Meditationstechnik suchen, um zu sich selbst zu finden und stressresistenter zu werden.
  • keine Meditations-Methode haben oder sich in deren Tradition nicht mehr Zuhause fühlen, bzw. diese ergänzen wollen.
  • dem angestammten, materialistischen Gesellschaftssystem ein neues Weltbild entgegensetzen möchten.
  • letztendlich erkennen wollen, dass man all die gewünschte Veränderung schon immer in uns angelegt sind.

 

Non-Duality-Tarot Set 1 Grosse Arkana;
«Die Reise zur eigenen Gewahrheit»

 

Inspirierende 1-minütige Videos auf Whatsapp

Einfach mal eine Minute innehalten, etwas beflügelndes und inspirierendes Anschauen und vielleicht einen Moment verweilen? Jeden Tag eine neue Karte des Non-Duality Tarots als Video.
Sende einfach via Whatsapp eine Nachricht an +49 163 777 2325 und es geht los.
Die Nachricht kommt dann von EvolutioNET GmbH, Hajo Michels, mindFUL LIFEstyle.
Selbstverständlich kannst du dich jederzeit wieder abmelden.

    Budget

    Die angestebten Geldmittel werden gebraucht um die Produktions-,  Liefer- und Grafikerkosten zu decken.

    • Sollte das Fundingziel nicht erreicht werden, so wird eine kleinere Anzahl des Non-Duality Tarots produziert, alle Backer erhalten trotzdem ihre Perks.
    • Es besteht also kein Risiko!
    • Ich führe das Projekt als Gesellschafter der schweizerischen Firma EvolutioNET GmbH - www.evolutionet.ch - durch.
    • Das Set und der Online Kurs werden auf jeden Fall produziert und lanciert werden.
     

    Perks

    Bei den Perks decken wir ein breites Spektrum ab. Da wir schon selbst einige Produkte erfolgreich lanciert haben - unser SAMTEN, ein aufblasbares Meditationskissen feiert dieses Jahr das 15-jährige Jubiläum *Hurrah* - können wir unsere Perks interessant und nützlich gestalten.
    So günstig, wie als Backer für dieses Projekt kommt man sonst an keines der angebotenen Produkte mehr ran.
     

    Meine wichtigsten beruflichen Stationen in Kürze

    • Geschäftsführer eines Warenhauses
    • Ausbildung zum NLP Business Coach
    • Manager einer Diskothek
    • Selbstständig als Einzelfirma, im Bereich Fundraising und Non-Profit Marketing
    • 1999: Für das Schweizerische Bundesamt für Gesundheit die erste «Stop AIDS» Webseite erstellt
    • 2001 bis heute: Geschäftsführer der EvolutioNET GmbH, Internetagentur «Mindful Communication»
    • 2003: Entwicklung des ersten aufblasbaren und leichtesten Meditationskissen der Welt: www.samten.ch

    2008: Im Rahmen meine Arbeit für die Schweizerische Kriminalprävention die Anti-Betrugskampagne «Den Trick kenne ich» entwickelt und als Buch publiziert

    • 2012: Ausbildung zum TV-Entertainment Producer, Filmschule Köln
     

    Belohnung für alle, die es bis hier her geschafft haben ;-)

     

     

     

    English Version

    This Campaign is to produce the German version of the Non-Duality Tarot. If we exceed the funding goal, we will make an English translation and produce an English version of the Tarot.

    Introduction

    Non-Duality is the direct path to connect with its wholeness and the origin of being. After decades of meditation and stagnation on my way I found non-duality. It helped me very quickly, better and better to get directly to my "true nature" and also to stay there, something that I only managed with other meditation techniques after hours of meditation, more by chance.

    The Non-Duality Tarot is my contribution to bring this knowledge closer to more people.

     

    What is unique about this project

    • The only non-duality tarot and oracle card set on the market.
    • The combination of a tarot and oracle card set, which can also be used as an introductory course in non-duality.
    • The completion of the set with a guided online course with multimedia content to deepen the topic even further.
    • In the online course there are two videos for each card (approx. 10-15 minutes each)
    • once with guided contemplations - consisting of questions on self-enquiry - and Meditations tailored and guided to the theme of the card.

     

    Why I am doing this project

    What fascinates me about non-duality is that it is

    • a fast and efficient way to connect to yourself.
    • opened up a whole new worldview for me. Away from the materialistic, outward-looking, to a spiritual, inward-looking, world view.
    • is not sectarian and secular.

    I want to make non-duality accessible to more people, because I think it is exactly the philosophy and method that is needed in today's world.

     

    Your involvement helps

    • Making non-duality better known.
    • To provide users of the tarot/course with a simple and direct meditation technique to find themselves.
    • to experience more personal responsibility.
    • Step by step instructions to a more fulfilled life.
    • To spread a world view that opposes something to our capitalist/materialistically influenced, aggravating social system.
    • To spread a non-sectarian and secular philosophy.

    Especially when you're recommend the project and share it via email or your social media.

     

    For whom is non-duality?

    For all who

    • are looking for a contemporary philosophy or worldview or an efficient meditation technique in order to find oneself and become more stress resistant.
    • have no meditation method or no longer feel at home in your tradition or want to complement it.
    • would like to oppose the traditional, materialistic social system with a new world view.
    • want to realize that they have always been all the desired changes.

     

    Budget

    The budget is used to cover production, delivery and graphic design costs.

    • If the funding target is not reached, a smaller quantity will be produced, all backers will receive their perks.
    • There is no risk!
    • I am running the project as owner of the Swiss EvolutioNET GmbH - www.evolutionet.ch -.
    • The set and the online course will definitely be produced and launched.

     

    The most important stages in my life in brief

    • Managing director of a department store.
    • Training as NLP Business Coach.
    • Manager of a discotheque.
    • Self-employed as a sole proprietorship in the field of fundraising and non-profit marketing.
    • 1999: I created the first "Stop AIDS" website for the Swiss Federal Office of Public Health.
    • 2001 until today: Managing Director of EvolutioNET GmbH, Internet agency "Mindful Communication".
    • 2003: Development of the world's first inflatable and lightest meditation cushion: www.samten.ch
    • 2008: In the context of my work for the Swiss Crime Prevention the anti-fraud campaign "Den Trick kenne ich" was developed and published as a book.
    • 2012: Training as TV-Entertainment Producer, Filmschule Köln

English Version at the bottom of the page
Was ist Non-Duality?


Mehr Videos gibt es unten auf der Seite.
 

Was ist das einzigartige an diesem Projekt

Es ist das einzige Non-Duality Tarot- und Orakelkarten Set auf dem Markt.
Es ist die einzigartige Kombination von einem Tarot- und Orakelkarten Set, welches gleichzeitig auch als Einführungskurs in Non-Duality genutzt werden kann.
Das Set wird mit einem geführten Online-Kurs ergänzt, der mit multimedialen Inhalten das Thema noch vertieft. 
Im Online-Kurs gibt es zu jeder Karte zwei Videos (je zirka 10- 15 Minuten Dauer) 
einmal mit angeleiteten Kontemplationen, - die aus Fragen zur Selbsterforschung bestehen - und
auf das Thema der Karte zugeschnittene und angeleitete Meditationen.



Warum ich dieses Projekt mache
Mich fasziniert an Non-Duality, dass es

mir schnell und effizient ermöglicht mich mit mir selbst zu verbinden.
mir eine völlig neue Weltsicht eröffnet hat. Weg vom materialistischen, nach aussen gerichteten, hinzu einem geistigen, nach innen gerichteten, Weltbild.
nicht sektiererisch, sondern säkular ist. 

Ich möchte Non-Duality mehr Menschen zugänglich machen, weil es ist genau die Philosophie und Methode ist, welche es in unserer heutigen Zeit braucht.
Deine Beteiligung hilft

Non-Duality bekannter zu machen.
Nutzern des Tarot / Kurses eine
einfache und direkte Meditationstechnik zur Verfügung zu stellen, um zu sich selbst zu finden.
mehr Selbstverantwortung zu erfahren.
eine Schritt für Schritt Anleitung zu einem erfüllteren Leben zu bekommen.


ein Weltbild zu verbreiten, welches unserem kapitalistisch / materialistisch geprägten, leidverursachenden Gesellschaftssystem, etwas alternatives entgegensetzt.
eine nicht sektiererische und weltliche Philosophie zu verbreiten.
insbesonders dann, wenn du
das Projekt  weiterempfiehlst und es via E-Mail oder deinen Sozialen Medien teilst.
dich auf www.nonduality-tarot.com in die Mailingliste einträgst, um Updates zu bekommen. 




 
Für wen ist Non-Duality?
Für alle, die

eine zeitgemässe Philosophie oder Weltanschauung, bzw. eine effiziente Meditationstechnik suchen, um zu sich selbst zu finden und stressresistenter zu werden.
keine Meditations-Methode haben oder sich in deren Tradition nicht mehr Zuhause fühlen, bzw. diese ergänzen wollen.
dem angestammten, materialistischen Gesellschaftssystem ein neues Weltbild entgegensetzen möchten.
letztendlich erkennen wollen, dass man all die gewünschte Veränderung schon immer in uns angelegt sind.


 
Non-Duality-Tarot Set 1 Grosse Arkana;«Die Reise zur eigenen Gewahrheit»

 
Inspirierende 1-minütige Videos auf Whatsapp
Einfach mal eine Minute innehalten, etwas beflügelndes und inspirierendes Anschauen und vielleicht einen Moment verweilen? Jeden Tag eine neue Karte des Non-Duality Tarots als Video.Sende einfach via Whatsapp eine Nachricht an +49 163 777 2325 und es geht los.Die Nachricht kommt dann von EvolutioNET GmbH, Hajo Michels, mindFUL LIFEstyle.Selbstverständlich kannst du dich jederzeit wieder abmelden.


Budget
Die angestebten Geldmittel werden gebraucht um die Produktions-,  Liefer- und Grafikerkosten zu decken.

Sollte das Fundingziel nicht erreicht werden, so wird eine kleinere Anzahl des Non-Duality Tarots produziert, alle Backer erhalten trotzdem ihre Perks. 
Es besteht also kein Risiko!
Ich führe das Projekt als Gesellschafter der schweizerischen Firma EvolutioNET GmbH - www.evolutionet.ch - durch. 
Das Set und der Online Kurs werden auf jeden Fall produziert und lanciert werden.


 
Perks
Bei den Perks decken wir ein breites Spektrum ab. Da wir schon selbst einige Produkte erfolgreich lanciert haben - unser SAMTEN, ein aufblasbares Meditationskissen feiert dieses Jahr das 15-jährige Jubiläum *Hurrah* - können wir unsere Perks interessant und nützlich gestalten.
So günstig, wie als Backer für dieses Projekt kommt man sonst an keines der angebotenen Produkte mehr ran.
 
Meine wichtigsten beruflichen Stationen in Kürze

Geschäftsführer eines Warenhauses
Ausbildung zum NLP Business Coach
Manager einer Diskothek
Selbstständig als Einzelfirma, im Bereich Fundraising und Non-Profit Marketing

2001 bis heute: Geschäftsführer der EvolutioNET GmbH, Internetagentur «Mindful Communication»
2003: Entwicklung des ersten aufblasbaren und leichtesten Meditationskissen der Welt: www.samten.ch



2008: Im Rahmen meine Arbeit für die Schweizerische Kriminalprävention die Anti-Betrugskampagne «Den Trick kenne ich» entwickelt und als Buch publiziert

2012: Ausbildung zum TV-Entertainment Producer, Filmschule Köln
 Belohnung für alle, die es bis hier her geschafft haben ;-)

story:
The Woodshed

With two books, and a number of new tunes in the works, Gern f. is going woodshedding at Silver Studios. Woodshedding is the process of going somewhere different - like a woodshed - with only the wood, your art and your brain. With your support, Gern f. will bring forth art that the world so sorely needs in these hard times (plus the slight possibility of woodcarvings).

The Art

“ I always believed that the best form of travel was to set yourself up in one place and let the world wander by.” – Gern f.

Following his book, “Turn Right, Turn Left, Repeat: Life on the road for the Canadian Indie Band,” Gern is crafting a collection of stories inspired by 20 years standing behind a bar while the world came through the door. Stories that while not necessarily the truth, expertly blend the facts, small lies and tall tales of the “truths” we all act upon. 

And the music…you knew there was gonna be music coming…

So get excited, contribute what you can, and keep an eye out for exclusive audio/visual bonus material awarded to all contributants.

Be Part of the Process

We have one very short month to raise the funds that will allow Gern to take the time to put in the labor and care required to bring to completion a couple of fantastic projects for your reading and listening pleasure. All contributions, great and small, even the price of a lousy cup of coffee, will have a very real and much appreciated impact on this goal.

  • To make a donation for any amount, just for the love of great art, click the "Back it" button.
  • OR choose from the list of great perks
  • All donors receive exclusive bonus material / sneak peaks at Gern’s art, in advance of public distribution of works created.

And, for more fun, tell your friends!

IT'S A MAJOR AWARD!
Participate in the Referral Contest to win a Major Award!
Here's how it works:

Refer your friends and help spread the word about our campaign. If the total contributions of all those you refer add up to $2000 or more, Gern f. will throw a party for you and 20 friends! He will provide food, stories, and even play a few tunes.

Contest rules:

  • To make your referral count, you must be logged into your Indiegogo account
  • To the right of the video above (near the "Back it" button) click the Link button (looks like an image of a chain link)
  • Copy your unique Share URL and use it to share this campaign on social media, email, your blog, whatever you can think of.
  • As your friends contribute to the campaign, you get closer to the Major Award!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but your help is still valuable:

  • You can help get the word out, make some noise about this campaign, and participate in the Referral Contest.
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Love,
Gern f.

story:
Short Summary

We started this Zine to help illustrate and document the creativity, passion and fortitude that is Newburgh. Our team is an eclectic group of artists, innovators, techies, writers and photographers. This medium will be our collective canvas to let folks outside of the “Burgh” know what is really going on, especially in regard to art, culture, innovation and the pioneering people that call Newburgh home.

We are part of Newburgh’s Renaissance, and as a patron you can be as well. Your patronage can help publish this quarterly publication and get people talking about and investing in Newburgh.

What We Need & What You Get

Some say print is dead. We say it isn't dead...but it does cost money!

  • We are looking to raise $6,000 to cover costs for the first  2 Issues of 12550 - the Zine - taking us from June 2018 through November 2018.
  • We will also being paying our freelance photographers and writers, because we believe they need to be recognized for their valuable contributions. Passion and art need to be nurtured and cultivated.
  • By contributing to 12550 - the Zine you will

1) help create something special from the ground up and

2) receive some cool perks that include but aren't limited to special thank you to our supporters in current and future Issues, year long subscriptions, and shout-outs on Instagram & Facebook.

  • Even if we don't reach our goal, the funds we raise here will help offset costs...because 12550 - the Zine is coming out no matter what!

As a patron of 12550 - the Zine, you will be on the inside of the Renaissance that is Newburgh, the last creative jewel in the Hudson River Valley. Get special access to the creative pioneers jump-starting 12550 - the Zine and gain exclusive behind-the-scenes photos and videos as they work their magic.  See what it takes to help foster a city through a creative Renaissance. Be one of the first to support this reclamation of Print and local community development.

The Impact

Your contribution matters:

  • The Founders and Editorial Staff have proven track records in Art, Business and Retail, they now how to get sh!t done and launch successful projects.
  • Everyone who is part of 12550 - the Zine has been volunteering their time, energy and content.
  • We need your help to make sure rest of the Region sees what an amazing place Newburgh is.

12550 - the Zine amplifies to outer communities and investors the potential of Newburgh as the next great home for creative artists and innovative entrepreneurs alike.

Risks & Challenges

$6,000 will help us get jump-started but it won't last forever:

  • The ultimate goal for 12550 - the Zine is to build a global following and tap into recurring contributions via the online platform called Patreon where supporters will be able contribute a range of options from $5 to $500 per month with corresponding perks and benefits.
  • But to get there we need to develop a kick-ass Issue with, establish a regional following and a successful track record. So we'll be using this campaign to help build our story and then launch on Patreon.
  • Our quarterly publication is abandoning the advertising model in order to focus on content. By reaching out to people who want to invest in the Newburgh Renaissance, we are keeping 12550 - the Zine true to its mission of focusing on what makes Newburgh great: art, culture and the people.

Other Ways You Can Help

If money just isn't your thing...:

  • Reach out to us about being a content contributor!
  • Help us spread the word by sharing our campaign with people who might say "Hey, money is totally my thing!"

About the Founders

Michael Muyot was born and raised in the Hudson Valley.  His father retired from IBM and Michael watched the aftermath of the IBM downsizing and offshoring to overseas workers. Because of this, he created a way to bring jobs back to the Hudson Valley and other communities like it, by introducing a theory of building and investing in local economies through online technologies. As president and co-founder of Local Analytics, he partnered with StateBook International to create a Community Building software. His love for the Hudson Valley and his passion for creating more jobs for his community, led to his co-creation of “12550 the Zine” to shine a light on the local artists and bring more creative people to the place he loves to call home: Newburgh.

Markus Hartel was born in a small industrial town in western Germany. His creative itch matched his love for mechanics when he started a typesetting apprenticeship. Times were changing and the new technology was killing the craft of printmaking, but Markus found a way to capitalize on this new wave of technology and opened his own print shop. Once he grew restless, he closed shop and moved to NYC where he became one of the better known modern Street Photographers. Eventually, the city was too chaotic for the life he wanted to pursue and he found Newburgh in an article while on vacation. One visit to Newburgh had him and the perfect letterpress had him hooked. He set up shop on Broadway and has loved Newburgh ever since.

story:
Hey!!!

Peter Harmon here, I am the author of The Happenstances... Young Adult Book Series from High Dive Publishing as well as the co-author of the Amazon Best Selling dad joke book A Daily Dose of Dad Jokes from Rockridge Press. I am a writer, producer, pug lover, husband, dad (and more! so multifaceted!) and I currently live in Los Angeles.

 

 

 

 

 

 

(hey that's me!)

I moved to LA from Maryland with hopes of writing things that people would read and/or watch on screen. After a few years of creating episodes of television, low budget movies, and other projects for other people, I decided to write exactly what I wanted to write and thus The Happenstances... books were born.

What is The Happenstances... Series?

This is a book series for young adults of all ages. Yes you could hand this book to your 13 year old, but I suspect you'll dig this easy read if you're of any age and you're looking for a fun book to read by the pool or at the beach or somewhere where you're wishing you were at one of those first two places.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The first book is a bittersweet, nostalgic, but comic story about a team of misfits, including a loser who secretly lives in the guard house of the club, a struggling artist with webbed toes, a timid teen with a concave chest, and the beautiful heiress of the Comfort Inn fortune. They have to win the impending Tri-County Relay Race and save the club from being run by a management company that only cares about money. The management company hires an opposing relay team of ringers including a girl with a prosthetic dorsal fin and a man named Carmichael Schmelps who looks suspiciously like a certain Olympic gold medalist.

Why now?

The first book in The Happenstances... Series, The Happenstances at the Yellow County Community Swim and Racquet Club the Summer Before Last,  was published 5 years ago as of this June. The previous publisher never did a Hardcover edition so I thought a fun way to celebrate the 5 year anniversary would be to release a Hardcover with a never before released short story in The Happenstances... universe.

This Indiegogo Campaign will serve as a pre-order for the book, as well as a way for people to get other fun perks from the High Dive Publishing repertoire. So check out the perks and please support how you can!

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't support this campaign financially (or frankly don't want to, haha!) you can still help us out:

  • Please share this campaign on your social media accounts or better yet, in real life! Nothing helps sell books like word of mouth from someone you trust.
  • Follow @HighDivePublishing and @TheHappenstancesSeries on Instagram for future projects.
  • Buy a High Dive Publishing T-Shirt here: https://www.teepublic.com/user/highdive/t-shirts
  • Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!!

Thank you!!!

- Pete and High Dive Publishing

The first book in The Happenstances... Series, The Happenstances at the Yellow County Community Swim and Racquet Club the Summer Before Last,  was published 5 years ago as of this June. The previous publisher never did a Hardcover edition so I thought a fun way to celebrate the 5 year anniversary would be to release a Hardcover with a never before released short story in The Happenstances... universe.
This Indiegogo Campaign will serve as a pre-order for the book, as well as a way for people to get other fun perks from the High Dive Publishing repertoire. So check out the perks and please support how you can!

Other Ways You Can Help
Even if you can't support this campaign financially (or frankly don't want to, haha!) you can still help us out:

Please share this campaign on your social media accounts or better yet, in real life! Nothing helps sell books like word of mouth from someone you trust.
Follow @HighDivePublishing and @TheHappenstancesSeries on Instagram for future projects.
Buy a High Dive Publishing T-Shirt here: https://www.teepublic.com/user/highdive/t-shirts

Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!!

Thank you!!!- Pete and High Dive Publishing

story:
our mission

Our mission is simple, to tell the story of Brooklyn hospitality through the creative expression of food and beverage professionals. We aim to do this by highlighting the variety of voices, talent and perspectives that make up Brooklyn’s rich, intersectional tapestry through art, design, recipes, poetry and stories. We have encountered some of the most creative, interesting, generous, intelligent and generally incredible people while working in the service industry, and this magazine is an ode to all of them. We also hope to forge a community in which we can all showcase our talents beyond service work and bond over shared experiences. As anyone who has ever worked in hospitality knows, we got stories for days.

We would like to prioritize the voices of women, BIPOC and LGBTQIA+ within the industry, though we hope to do so from a place of inclusivity, not exclusivity. We are not interested in foodporn, "trendy" new openings or pretentious reviews. Our focus is on people, the heart and soul of hospitality.

The Anti- Bon Appetit, if you will.

 

who we are

Giorgia and Emi. Just a couple of service industry professionals out of a job, looking to use this time to create something meaningful. We first met at a wine tasting group in Brooklyn and went on to attend a wine-education program together. We have both worked in restaurants and wine bars all over the city. Giorgia is a Brooklyn native with a degree in Communication Design.  Emi received her Bachelor's degree in Hospitality Business from Michigan State University and has been in the hospitality industry ever since, she has been living in Brooklyn for 10 years. 

 

our goal

We are not in this to make a profit, we are relying on fundraising that will be supplemented by out of pocket expenses in order to cover the costs of printing and compensation for our contributors.

We're hoping that together we can get this thing off the ground and pave way for many more issues! If it isn't within your means to donate, we would love it if you shared with your friends!

story:
Ervaar met GINGER geluid bij de favoriete boekjes van je kindje.

 

 

VOLG ONS OP FACEBOOK

 

 

 

 

 

Blijf op de hoogte van GINGER

 

 

Met GINGER wordt voorlezen magisch! 

Door geluiden, muziekjes of stemmen toe te voegen aan wat je voorleest, maakt deze app voor ouders en kinderen elk verhaal magisch!

GINGER is een app die voorlezen interactief maakt door geluiden af te spelen en je fantasie te prikkelen.

 

 

Een app voor Android- en iOS-smartphones, die je gebruikt in combinatie met een kinderboek.

De app werkt zo: 

  1. Kies het boek dat je wil voorlezen.
  2. Scan de ISBN-code op de achterflap van je boek.
  3. Ginger downloadt de geluiden die voor het boek beschikbaar zijn.
  4. Leg je smartphone opzij, binnen het bereik van je stem maar uit het zicht van je kindje. 
  5. Start met voorlezen. Ginger luistert mee en zet je woorden om in geluid, muziek of stemmetjes, waardoor het verhaal een extra dimensie krijgt!

 

 

GINGER is een app zonder digitale afleiding.

Ginger maakt gebruik van spraaktechnologie.
Dankzij deze slimme technologie:

  • hoef je je telefoon op geen enkel moment tijdens het voorlezen aan te raken;
  • voeg je géén extra schermtijd toe aan de interactie met je kind;
  • speelt de app automatisch geluid af op precies het goede moment in het verhaal.

Ginger werkt dus heel eenvoudig en dat is doelbewust. Zo kan je je volledig focussen op je kind en het verhaal. 

 

 

GINGER is een app die ouders en hun kindjes dichter bij elkaar brengt. 

#wistjedat?

  • Boeken voorlezen draagt bij tot de verbinding tussen ouder en kind. 
  • Wanneer je kinderen van jongs af aan voorleest, wakker je hun leesmotivatie aan. 
  • Lezen heeft een belangrijke invloed op de cognitieve en sociale ontwikkeling van je kind en stimuleert het de creativiteit.

Door geluiden toe te voegen aan alle mogelijke verhalen draagt GINGER een steentje bij. Je kind gaat nog meer op in het verhaal en tegelijk wordt de fantasie, creativiteit en plezier van jou en je kind extra gestimuleerd.

Ook voor ouders, wordt voorlezen dus nog leuker!

 

 

 

 

Doelstellingen

Onze groeiplannen - CROWDFUNDING VOOR MEER GINGER

Lancering & aanbod

Wat als elk verhaal een geluidsdimensie kreeg? 

Ons doel is om GINGER op 1 oktober 2021 te lanceren. Steun onze crowdfunding en krijg als eerste toegang aan een fixe korting! Uiteraard garanderen we een ruim aanbod. Bij lancering zorgen we voor geluid bij 100 prentenboeken en tegen eind 2021 maken we daar een aanbod van 300 (of meer!) van. Dat zijn 15 nieuwe titels van prentenboeken waar GINGER geluid bij creëert per week.

Ook de uitbreiding naar prentenboeken in andere talen staat op het programma.

 

 

Sociaal-maatschappelijke meerwaarde

Investeren in kwalitatief geluid? Natuurlijk! 

We willen jonge creatievelingen aan het werk zetten. Zo kan je van uniek en kwalitatief geluid genieten.

En steun je onze crowdfunding? Dan steun je ook een goed doel. Onder het motto #eentjekopeneentjegeven doneer je bij elke aankoop van een GINGER abonnement, een gratis abonnement aan één van de gezinnen die door Stichting de Voorleesexpress worden begeleid.

Deze organisatie zorgt ervoor dat kinderen met een taalachterstand extra aandacht krijgen. Vrijwilligers zetten zich  in om thuis met ouders en kinderen aan de slag te gaan met taal en voorlezen. Hun doel is om leesplezier een vaste plek te geven in alle gezinnen. Een doelstelling die GINGER 100% deelt!

 

 

 

 

 

Team

 

 

 

 

Het verhaal achter GINGER

“Ik ben Vincent. Papa van twee zoontjes. Ik geloof dat lezen een fundamentele rol speelt in de intellectuele en creatieve ontwikkeling van mijn kinderen. Daarom hebben we thuis veel kinderboekjes die we heel vaak samen lezen. 

Geluidenboekjes zijn hier ontzettend populair, maar we moeten vaak de batterijen vervangen, waardoor deze boekjes een hoge ecologische voetafdruk hebben. Bovendien zijn ze moeilijk te recyclen. 

Tijd dus voor een alternatief! En die komt in de vorm van een app. Zo kan je op een duurzamere manier geluid toevoegen aan élk kinderverhaal!”

 

 

 

 

Duurzaamheid

Klassieke geluidenboekjes hebben een impact op het milieu. Ze zijn terecht ontzettend populair, maar je moet vaak de batterijen vervangen en ze zijn moeilijk te recyclen.

GINGER is een duurzaam product.

Vanuit duurzaam oogpunt is het een logische redenering om de ingebouwde elektronica in de geluidenboekjes volledig te elimineren. Dit noemen we dematerialisatie. Dat kan in dit geval worden gedaan door de elektronica te vervangen door het gebruik van een smartphone-applicatie. 

Maar, hoe kunnen we dan de juiste geluiden op het juiste moment triggeren? Spraakherkenning is daarvoor de geschikte technologie. Zo speelt het geluid automatisch af op precies het goede moment in het verhaal. Bovendien verbetert de leeservaring omdat er geen afleidende drukknoppen meer nodig zijn in het boek (of op de smartphone).

 

 

 

 

Toekomstvisie

Met GINGER willen we kinderen enthousiast maken voor het fysieke boek en een overaanbod aan schermtijd beperken.

Daarvoor willen we hoog kwalitatieve geluidservaringen ontwikkelen die elk prentenboek nog interactiever en leuker maakt. 

Door gebruik te maken van spraaktechnologie kunnen we de toepassing makkelijk naar verschillende talen opschalen.

Dankzij digitale toepassingen, het gebruik van artificiële intelligentie, een onbeperkte opslagcapaciteit en een verbetering van de geluidskwaliteit, bereiken we meer mogelijkheden voor auteurs en uitgevers om aan de slag te gaan met verhalen en geluid. We vergroten de mogelijk tot variatie waardoor elke geluidservaring steeds uniek wordt.

story:
Who am I and why am I creating ImagineCreativeMe.com?

At 44 years of age, I found myself stuck in a mid-life rut.  I had worked as a teacher in the same secondary school for 17 years.  Every day felt like I was in a hamster wheel.  I tried to climb out but felt compelled to keep pushing the wheel round from the outside.  I realised that my heart was not in the system I was working in.  I had taken many opportunities over those 17 years but I had reached where I wanted to go with teaching.

I wanted a fresh challenge and had always yearned to run my own business.  The sensible option was to stay in my financially secure job but I did not want to hold myself back from following my dreams.  I realised that there are many other people, women in particular, who reach this crossroads and are too scared to take the road less travelled.  

I want to provide a helping hand and inspiration to all those women out there feeling like they cannot change their lives, like they have to make the sensible choice.  Funding ImagineCreativeMe is not just delivering my dream but also helping other women to find out what their passions are and enabling these women to pursue their passions.

What is the funding for?

I know it sounds like a lot, but crowdfunding the full amount of £15,000 will deliver the magazine launch on 1st July 2019 which includes:

  • design and content production of magazine on website
  • set up of online shop on website
  • manufacture and preparation of goods for online shop, including design and production of recyclable packaging)
  • set up of membership area on website
  • marketing and launch of the magazine, including cost of advertising

10% of all money raised will be donated to Women's Aid.  Women’s Aid is the national charity working to end domestic abuse against women and children. Since 1974 they have been at the forefront of shaping and coordinating responses to domestic abuse, with survivors at the heart of their work.  They are a federation of over 180 organisations which provide just under 300 local lifesaving services to women and children across the country, including the South West.

If you decide to help fund imaginecreativeme.com, you  will be rewarded with some perks including discounts from the online shop, early bird discounts for future events and subscriptions to the members network.  You can donate and gift the perks to your friend/wife/girlfriend/partner/mother. 

The magazine will launch no matter what funding is reached, although it will impact on the size and date of launch, e.g. the magazine will be launched at a much later date, the members network and the shop will be launched some time after the magazine is launched. The earlier I reach the target the better as it means I have more time to create the end products for my readers and network members rather than running a crowdfunding campaign which in itself is time consuming.  With this in mind It would help to reach a third or half of the target by Easter weekend.  It would also show that the business has the backing of the community. 

Who will benefit from ImagineCreativeMe.com?

With the age of retirement getting later and a general feeling of dissatisfaction amongst women over 40, there is a need for imaginecreativeme.com.  Many women reach their 40s and have either taken a career break to look after children or have taken a job that suits the family but didn't necessarily provide individual fulfilment.  If they have children, they are likely to be flying the nest. Some of these women may find themselves to be single through divorce or because they simply haven't  uncovered 'the one' under any of the stones that they have upturned.  Many of these women will have low self esteem and low confidence.  They are likely to feel like it's about time that they did something just for themselves.

For individuals feeling stuck in a mid-life rut, the magazine will contain a plethora of inspirational ideas and guidance from experts offering practical steps that can be taken to tiptoe or leap out of those ruts.  This will be supported by on and offline events along with a supportive members network that will provide an encouraging virtual and physical space to experiment with possibilities.

For businesses in the South West, big or small, there are opportunities to reach out to women in mid-life who need support and ideas for anything from a new hobby to a complete career change.

As a socially responsible business, 10% of all profits will be donated to charities chosen by readers. 

imaginecreativeme.com actively supports campaigns that work towards the UN's sustainable development goals.  It supports international, national and local campaigns particularly supporting equality for all and environmental issues. imaginecreativeme.com works with other socially responsible, sustainable businesses and individuals.

Risks and Challenges?

You might be thinking: what qualifies an ex-teacher to run a business, let alone create a magazine? 

Firstly, I haven't always been a teacher.  Before teaching, I worked for a television post-production company.  I had always wanted to work in the media but I had a young child and the working hours did not suit my family's needs at that time.

I wasn't just a teacher (although being 'just a teacher' shows that you can manage 30+ hormonal students and get them to learn subjects that they do not necessarily have an interest in), I have had a number of years experience working in different management roles within school culminating in 4 years as an Assistant Headteacher with a number of responsibilities which included:

  • marketing and communications (external and internal publications, advertising, PR, website, social media management...)
  • events management,
  • customer service,
  • careers education
  • line management of a number of staff and departments (teaching and support staff)
  • community outreach
  • staff training and so on.

I taught English, Drama and Media Studies, which meant that I had to maintain a working knowledge of each subject as well as developing technology in order to teach the practical elements of the subjects.

As a lead for Careers Education I voluntarily took part in training by people from the real world of work from across a range of industries including professional services, engineering, creative and digital, medical, low carbon and so on which places me in a position to understand how to advise on career change and has provided me with contacts within these areas.

My previous work experience means that I am well-versed in project management.  I have always had to juggle a large number of projects.  I also understand the importance of building relationships within the community and listening to people's needs.

Ways you can help

Donations are very welcome and will be most gratefully received but I understand that many people are not in the position to help financially.  You can still be of great help to me by making some noise about imaginecreativeme.com!  You can:

  • Follow me on social media and share my posts/videos about the business and crowdfunding.  It's not enough to just like the posts, you need to share and comment.  Social media sites like Facebook are interested in how much people are interacting with posts and that's how they choose which ones people see on their timelines.  So Like by all means but, comment and share too.
  • Email your friends and work colleagues, explaining why they should help me and my business. (Adaptable templates available on imaginecreativeme.com)
  • Email your business contacts in the South West.  From hotels and spas to sports facilities and everything in between.  Explain how my business will help them.  (Adaptable templates available on imaginecreativeme.com)
  • Email my ex-students.  Who knows some of them may have learned something and wish to help their old teacher.
  • Use the IndieGoGo share tools.
  • Offer some additional perks to encourage others to donate.  This could be discount vouchers for your business, a physical product or your services, e.g. if you are a career coach, you could offer a 1 hour consultation. Email jbaldwin@imaginecreativeme.com if you would like to offer a perk/perks.

school culminating in 4 years as an Assistant Headteacher with a number of responsibilities which included:
marketing and communications (external and internal publications, advertising, PR, website, social media management...)
events management,
customer service,
careers education
line management of a number of staff and departments (teaching and support staff)
community outreach
staff training and so on.
I taught English, Drama and Media Studies, which meant that I had to maintain a working knowledge of each subject as well as developing technology in order to teach the practical elements of the subjects.As a lead for Careers Education I voluntarily took part in training by people from the real world of work from across a range of industries including professional services, engineering, creative and digital, medical, low carbon and so on which places me in a position to understand how to advise on career change and has provided me with contacts within these areas.My previous work experience means that I am well-versed in project management.  I have always had to juggle a large number of projects.  I also understand the importance of building relationships within the community and listening to people's needs.Ways you can helpDonations are very welcome and will be most gratefully received but I understand that many people are not in the position to help financially.  You can still be of great help to me by making some noise about imaginecreativeme.com!  You can:

Follow me on social media and share my posts/videos about the business and crowdfunding.  It's not enough to just like the posts, you need to share and comment.  Social media sites like Facebook are interested in how much people are interacting with posts and that's how they choose which ones people see on their timelines.  So Like by all means but, comment and share too.

Email your friends and work colleagues, explaining why they should help me and my business. (Adaptable templates available on imaginecreativeme.com)

Email your business contacts in the South West.  From hotels and spas to sports facilities and everything in between.  Explain how my business will help them.  (Adaptable templates available on imaginecreativeme.com)

Email my ex-students.  Who knows some of them may have learned something and wish to help their old teacher.
Use the IndieGoGo share tools.

Offer some additional perks to encourage others to donate.  This could be discount vouchers for your business, a physical product or your services, e.g. if you are a career coach, you could offer a 1 hour consultation. Email jbaldwin@imaginecreativeme.com if you would like to offer a perk/perks.

story:
THE PAPER AND ME

Ciao, my name is Cecilia and I live in Verona. In my spare time I patiently carve out new suggestions. My projects reflect my awakening and they pay attention to the wonderful worlds  around and inside me. Looking for an ever day lightness I discovered a new dialogue with a so fragile, inconsistent and short lasting material as paper.

IO E LA CARTA 

Ciao, mi chiamo Cecilia e vivo con la mia famiglia a Verona. Sono uno spirito libero e creativo... il mio lavoro è la mia passione. Nei ritagli di tempo ritaglio pazientemente nuove suggestioni. I miei progetti rispecchiano il mio risveglio e una nuova attenzione per i meravigliosi mondi attorno e dentro di me. Cercando la leggerezza anche nella quotidianità ho scoperto un nuovo dialogo con un materiale fragile e inconsistente.

 

A MESSAGE OF LIGHT .

The harmonious and poetic images became a route, a story, very similar to mine and to many others, I’m sure. In the book there are images and insights, there is no philosophical or religious orientation, but spiritual thinking, the topics are not exhaustive, just smell hints of the most know Master, but the experimentation is purely subjective. I focus on the present moment, to listen, observe and think autonomously; to better appreciate peace, quietness and also our effervescent society. I want to bring a spark to underline the fact that every single moment of this crazy and fantastic live is worth living, with availability and with an open heart, you can choose your best way to find easiness and happiness.

UN MESSAGGIO DI LUCE

Le immagini, armoniose, poetiche, sono diventate un percorso, un racconto simile alla mia storia e, sono sicura, anche a tante altre storie. Nel libro ci sono immagini e spunti di riflessione, non c’è orientamento filosofico e teologico, non parlo di religione, ma di spiritualità; gli argomenti trattati non sono esaustivi, accenno agli insegnamenti dei maestri spirituali più noti, ma la sperimentazione è soggettiva. Pongo l’attenzione al momento presente, per ascoltare, osservare e ragionare autonomamente, poter apprezzare la pace e la quiete ma anche la nostra effervescente società. Voglio portare una scintilla di luce per dire che si può gustare ogni istante di questa pazza fantastica vita, con disponibilità e cuore aperto, si può scegliere la via più adatta per trovare benessere e felicità.

 

A BOOK FULL OF SURPRISES

Every picture has an essential graphic, an equilibrium between full and empty, which reflects the problems that we daily encounter in order to develop and acquire a new welfare. I chose a 21cm x 21cm format, and only at the end of the job I realized that the images are also 21 cm; and thinking that everything happens for a reason, I remembered this curious fact where an American Doctor discovered that in the early ‘900 the actual weight of the soul: 21 grams!     The book has 21 pictures with easy phrases which make curiosity arise so that the reader can freely deepen the important spiritual topics. The book is dedicated to all the people that are looking for wellness and inner peace and have acknowledged that there is much more beyond the everyday reality! The pictures are realized through paper-cut , that is, white paper is carved, and in some pages it is possible to move some elements, which modify the final artwork and lets the book “self-animate”.The choice of black pages underlines the collision between full and empty and leads to surprise scenes.

UN LIBRO PIENO DI SORPRESE

Ogni disegno ha una grafica essenziale, un equilibrio tra il pieno e il vuoto che rispecchia le problematiche che incontriamo quotidianamente. Ho scelto il formato 21 cm. X 21 cm. e solo alla fine del lavoro mi sono resa conto che le immagini erano proprio 21; pensando che nulla succede per caso, mi sono ricordata di un fatto curioso in cui un medico statunitense agli inizi del ‘900, riuscì a scoprire quale fosse il peso dell’anima: 21 grammi! Il libro ha 21 immagini accompagnate da semplici frasi (scritte in 2 lingue) che fanno sbocciare la curiosità per approfondire liberamente temi spirituali importanti. E’ un libro dedicato a tutte le persone che hanno capito che la realtà non è solo ciò che si vede! Le immagini sono realizzate con la tecnica paper-cut, ossia la carta bianca viene intagliata e traforata e, in alcune pagine, si possono muovere degli elementi modificando così il disegno finale che si completa e si anima. Le pagine nere di sfondo fanno risaltare il contrasto tra pieno e vuoto e a volte celano altre scene a sorpresa.

 

TOGETHER WE CAN DO A LOT

 I thought that, it is a way to create together positive energy, because I thoroughly believe this small book is message of light and your contributions will be fundamental. On this platform, it is possible to finance projects also with small amounts. Each of will take part to this adventure by choosing a special gift among the objects created for this special occasion.( gadget, postcards, t-shirt and experience). The copies of the book won’t be purchasable in shops but only through this “crowd funding campaign”. I immensely thank you and appreciate your support, and hope to share soon the results of our collaboration. I am really convinced that all together “good  energy” can truly increase! You can follow me and my updated works by visiting the following website: www.ceciliapirovini.wixsite.com/angel                                                                                     You can share your opinion and choice by spreading the voice on Facebook and Instagram.

INSIEME SI PUO’ FARE MOLTO

Ho pensato a questo modo di creare insieme buona energia, perché ci credo veramente, perché questo piccolo libro è un messaggio di luce e i vostri contributi saranno tutti fondamentali per arrivare in fondo. In questa piattaforma si finanziano dei progetti anche con piccole somme. Ognuno di voi farà parte di questa avventura scegliendo un dono speciale tra gli oggetti creati per l’occasione. Vi ringrazio immensamente e spero di vedere presto il frutto della nostra collaborazione; i fondi serviranno per la stampa del libro che arriverà direttamente a casa vostra e non sarà venduto nelle tradizionali librerie. Se vi piace questo progetto e volete far parte di questa avventura potete condividere la vostra scelta spargendo la voce su Facebook, Instagram, e i tutti i social che amate. Per conoscermi meglio e seguire il mio lavoro e le novità potrete visitare il sito web: www.ceciliapirovini.wixsite.com/angel

ANOTHER GOAL

If together we'll be able to collect a sum which exceeds the costs of production of the book, I would like to use the funds to start up a craft activity for greeting cards.

These cards with soul will be special, with delicated images and aphorismsas a gift to those are passing through difficult periods, by giving them a positive message and faith. I'm thinking of places such as hospitals or nursing homes, in order to make the people who are suffering a little smile.

 

UN'ALTRO OBIETTIVO

Se riusciremo insieme a raccogliere una somma superiore al budget richiesto per la produzione del libro, io vorrei avviare una attività artigianale di biglietti di auguri.

"I BIGLIETTI CON L'ANIMA" saranno speciali, con immagini delicate e aforismi, da regalare a chi sta affrontando momenti difficili, dando un messaggio positivo e di speranza. Penso a dei luoghi come gli ospedali e case di cura, per portare un sorriso a chi soffre.
