story:
New Offer! Everyone who donates - even just $1 - will receive a PDF of In Duet with God. Your support is SO appreciated!!!

The Story...

Thank you for visiting my Indiegogo fundraiser. Please help me publish my first book - a beautiful tale of the heart. My name is Jessica Roemischer. At the age of five, I began to write (and play the piano).

This is my diary. It was given to me by a woman named Flora.

Flora raised and nurtured me, miraculously finding her way to the USA from a village in Ecuador. In the diary she gave me, I shared my innermost feelings. I also wrote about Flora. Although I was young, I noticed how all of life - animals, birds, and people - was drawn to her. A small photo from 1970 shows Flora sitting on the living room couch, our two cats curled tightly by her side. They had to be as close as possible. This is Flora's favorite cat, "Little Blackie."

I've just finished writing my first book, In Duet with God: The Story of a Lifelong Friendship. It's a testament to Flora's love. The book begins... "It took me forty-five years to realize that I'd been raised by a saint, but as I look back, there were signs along the way..."

Praise for In Duet with God...

Early versions of the book were sent to some remarkable people. I'm honored to have received these endorsements:

"In Duet with God is a book you can never 'finish.' Jessica's wisdom, faith and love become part of your own life and the door she opens for each reader is a gift you will cherish always." Frances Hesselbein, President and CEO of The Frances Hesselbein Leadership Institute, recipient of the Presidential Medal of Freedom

"In Duet with God reads like the classic children's story, The Little Prince. Of course, like The Little Prince, this book's simplicity is also profound. I would call it religious art." Jim Marion, author, Institute for Spiritual Awareness, Washington, D.C.,

"It's a true blessing to read In Duet with God - a luminously loving tale of the author's 'guardian angel' and the journey of the heart she inspired." Cynthia Bourgeault, Founding Director of The Contemplative Society, Episcopal priest, author of Love is Stronger Than Death and other books

"In Duet with God  reveals that with all of our humanity we are homo sanctus—sacred beings. This new book is a true gem to be enjoyed and cherished in duet with Jessica and her unique genius for lovingly touching your heart." 
 Yasuhiko Kimura, Philosopher and Founder, Vision-in-Action (from the Foreword)

"Reading In Duet with God comes with a surprise: Jessica's storytelling, by design, works to inspire you to reflect on your own life and its stories, waiting to be remembered and revealed." Debbe Kennedy, Axiom Business Book Award Winner, Founder and CEO of Global Dialogue Center and Leadership Solutions Companies

"I read the first 'printing' of In Duet with God, and re-read it, and then read it again. One thing it is NOT is a preachy, dogmatic book. It is about a spiritual journey, and there is a big difference. This is the story of love and nurturing and how that opened a mind and heart. In Duet with God is a keeper!" Sylvia Shea Lapinski, Chesterfield, MA

Your Support...

Your contribution will help me bring Flora's story to bookshelves and touchscreens around the world (and there are MANY rewards of the book and my award-winning piano music for your donation). Until recently, a traditional publishing house was necessary. But in the 21st century, I can share Flora's story with a vast audience. Self-publishing has become mainstream. Have you heard the term, "artisanal publishing?" An artisan is someone who "makes a high quality and distinctive product by hand." It means that the author (me) lovingly oversees every aspect of the book's production, choosing a team of people who'll help me create, not just a book, but a beautiful work of art that will inspire all who read it.

To do that, I need your help! The cost of publishing In Duet with God is $12,000. Four-and-a-half years of writing and almost an entire lifetime went into creating this book. The hard part is done. I'm now hand-picking the best people I can find in the art and self-publishing world. Here's what your support makes possible:

  • Cover Artist -  You CAN tell a book by its cover! Stephanie Anderson is a fabulous painter and illustrator. Her covers appeared on books published by Simon & Schuster, and received the Jane Addams Peace Honor. Have a look at one of Stephanie's paintings. She's currently creating a beautiful cover
    illustration that captures in delicate detail the feeling of Flora and her relationship to life. This is an example of Stephanie's artwork...

  • Cover and Book Designer - The designer will take Stephanie's illustration and create a magnificent cover, choosing the typeface and layout for the title, name, endorsements, and other book cover elements. When you open a book, it looks pretty straightforward, but a lot goes into choosing typeface and formatting of the text. The inside of a book needs designing, too.

  • Copy Editor and Proofreading - All editors are not created equal! I've been blessed to find Sarah Aschenbach. One author said: "Sarah edited my manuscript. It's won two national awards within thirty days of its release, and its success is due in part to Sarah's skill as a finely-tuned wordsmith!" Sarah is underway, editing In Duet with God.  A final proofreading of the text is essential, too.

  • ISBN and Copyright registration - All books need an International Standard Book Number. Also, In Duet with God is registered with the United States Copyright Office.
  • Attorney's Fees - This is an unusual and significant aspect of the budget. Last year, in the middle of my writing the book, I was appointed by the NY Supreme Court as Flora's legal guardian. I now care for her in the way she cared for me. As a result, I needed court approval to publish my book about Flora. I have a wonderful attorney. And we've been blessed with a wonderful judge. In October, 2014, the judge granted me the right to publish the book. Her verdict: "God knows the world needs this story."                         
  • Printing 1,000 copies of the Softcover Paperback Edition of In Duet with God
  • eBook Conversion of In Duet with God, for download to Kindle, Nook, iPad and other eReaders
  • Distribution of the book and eBook to Amazon, Barnes & Noble, and more.

By contributing, you'll help me make all this happen!

The Perks You'll Receive...

Every contribution gets a heartfelt THANK YOU on the In Duet with God Facebook Page and my personal Facebook Page as well as my website. Hundreds and even thousands of people will appreciate the support you're giving this worthwhile project! You can also receive the eBook, a signed copy of the softcover edition, a frame-ready print of the cover artwork, a SKYPE call with me about In Duet with God, a creativity coaching session for a project YOU'RE interested in, a live SKYPE performance, and even an IN-PERSON reading and piano performance in YOUR home or community! AND there are many perks that receive my award-winning piano music! All donations of $500 and higher will be acknowledged in the book.

What You're Bringing to the World...

In Duet with God is a story of faith and innocence, inspired by Flora's love for me and for all living things. Please help me bring this story to many. Here's one testimonial that captures my aspiration for the book:

"It is so clear what Jessica is onto here---nothing less than the realization of real beauty, real joy, real enduring humanity. She has poked a window from here to the other side--a way of seeing into truth where no fear can have sway."
Carrie Vanderwagen, Berkeley, CA

More testimonials are on my website. Help me share these qualities through the publication of In Duet with God - the story of Flora's life and mine. Thank you!

    Risks & Challenges?

    The hardest part is completed: The entire manuscript has been written, I have the legal go-ahead on Flora's behalf, I've found a great editor (she said my manuscript is the 'cleanest' and best-written she's ever received), a wonderful cover artist, printer, and more. I've already run one successful fundraising campaign to produce my piano album, "Light Born of Light" in 2014. I received 65 donations. (If you donated to that campaign, a HUGE thank you - please consider supporting In Duet with God, too!) I'll be keeping everyone updated as the publication of In Duet with God moves forward.

    Other Ways You Can Help!

    If you can't contribute, you can still help me bring this beautiful story to the world:

    • Help get the word out by sharing on your Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and other social media sites!
    • There are Indiegogo share tools, which make it easy!

    Thank you so much!!

story:
Who we are?

We are two brothers, professionals in Graphic Design and Marketing who have joined our knowledge to the talent and sewing experience of our mother to create more than just a clothing brand: a concept "YOUR WORLD IS ALSO MINE" that help children grow loving and respecting nature.

We are a family business based in the city of Cochabamba, Bolivia (South America) and we are very concerned about the current ecological degradation in almost every cities in the world with the loss of valuable plants and animal species, so we decided to begin the change NOW AND WE WANT YOU TO BE PART OF IT !!!

It’s been 4 years since we started creating our own designs, and then putting them into high quality child and baby clothing, which led to great brand and concept acceptance in many major cities in our country Bolivia.

What do we want to do?

With the “Your world is also mine” project, we want to start a positive change in children, to leave behind us a better generation of people for the planet.

By our commitment to help animals this time will allocate part of the proceeds to donate to a nonprofit institution dedicated to caring for animals. 

Our “your world is also mine” project, consists on making everyone (especially the kids) realize that the world is populated and owned by all living beings, plants, animals, even humans, and all of us are necessary to achieve the right balance on the earth.

How are we going to make it?

With your support and with the desire we have to work for a better world.

We will use our garments combined creative and unique designs with animals that tell you "YOUR WORLD IS ALSO MINE".

We want that all of our t-shirts carry our motto “your world is also mine” as a unique identifier. This altogether will wander many places not only reaching the person who owns the t-shirt, but also reaching anybody who sees it and reads it.


Our biggest inspiration is taking care of the planet. And holding that cause; we want to give you the power of being part of this project and make a change together.

Why do we need your help?

We are eager to work, but we don’t reach the budget for making an upgrade to make an expansion to our production model so we reach more children, who at the same time, are going to be touched and become conscious that the world is from all of us, and each and every one of us should be taking care of it. 

As a family business, we also have responsibility over our working force and their families, not only of growing but also bringing them better life and work conditions, so they positively impact their communities.

We are sure we are going to make it with your support. 

Everybody knows what kind of damage people are doing to the earth with the uncontrolled deforestation going on, the excessive and unnecessary use of water and contaminating energy, the ever growing quantity of garbage stored and the extinction of whole species, are some of the main reasons we started the “mio” brand, and the “your world is also mine” motto, to start giving children some conscience about what is going on with our planet.

With our different and exclusive designs we want to start a change, a change of attitude and reach more and more people, to care about what comes next, after us, leave a better place for our children, and live better children to the world, preserving our environment, many species of plants and animals.

How will the fouds be used?

The money raised will be used to grow and increase our production and this way reach more people with our message "YOUR WORLD IS ALSO MINE" in our country Bolivia and all over the world.

Also $ 1 of every $ 30 will be donated to the animal shelter San Martin de Porres to help improve the care given to the animals.

San Martin de Porres is a center for the rescue, shelter, recovery, adaptation and adoption of pets were abandoned and / or battered.

How will the extra founds be used?

The extra founds will be used to help the families that work in mio to improve their working and life conditions.

You can find us online and get in touch with us using the links below. Thanks for supporting us and believing in our project leaving better people to the planet !!

https://www.tumundotambienesmio.com

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Tu-Mundo-Tambien-es-MIO/153088131419613

http://www.twitter.com/tmbmio


THE COLLECTION

(you can choose your t-shirt size, color and design from here)

story:
Evelyn’s Lighthouse is a unique project…. a family project.  It brings together two writers, Mark Roberts (52) and his niece, Pate Clevenger (12), working together to tell the story of Evelyn Young, the daughter of the lighthouse keeper at Split Rock Lighthouse in Minnesota in 1924.  Combined, these two writers have crafted a story that young women today will find fun, encouraging, and even filled with suspense.

While Evelyn is a fictional character, the story is historical and is thoroughly well-researched and fact based.  The operation of the lighthouse, where the station is and its role, the technologies of the time, and more are all set very carefully and historically in the year 1924.  Real people are used throughout and the geographical details and places are accurate.  The novel gives readers the opportunity to step back in time and see what life was like at a lighthouse in 1924 (and Split Rock is a fabulously beautiful and very famous light station), and to learn from Evelyn’s adventuresome spirit, love of reading, and her determination to help her family and her lighthouse.

Evelyn’s Lighthouse has been completed, except for some final editing.

We are trying to raise $3500 so as to present the best and most polished book to the reader possible.  The $3500 will go largely to pay for professional editing services.  We have engaged Ann Creel to edit the manuscript.  Ann is a professional author, writer, and editor who has written many books for the young adult audience, including American Girl books.  Ann has edited the first half of the book with good results.  She is very complimentary of the writing and believes in our book.  We think her editing skills and experience will go a long way toward making Evelyn’s Lighthouse the best possible book for you, the reader.  The rest of the funds will go to cover design and artwork and promotional fees.

Before starting this project, Mark had found, like every parent/uncle/grandparent has in the past few years, that it’s really difficult to spend time with family without those phones, that we’re all so addicted to, intruding.  Mark began this project so he could spend real, quality time with his niece, Pate, who is now his co-author.  So please consider that this project is more than just a project.  This book is more than just a book.  It’s also a BRIDGE that will take your niece, your daughter, …. YOU, back in time to America in 1924.  A time without mobile phones…. but a time with so much to say. 

If you will join with us in this unique project, you will help our story grow from good to great AND you will receive a book you will treasure and enjoy with family.  We hope you will come to Evelyn’s Lighthouse with us!

story:
Exciting and moving memories about the Maccabiah.

Make the inspirational stories last forever.

Let's publish the Hall of the Maccabiah!

Ver el vídeo en español! Haga clic AQUÍ!

The Hall of the Maccabiah is the first book that includes over 100 fantastic stories about the world's largest Jewish sport competition, the Maccabiah.

The book was created for:

  • The 20th anniversary of Maccabiah, 
  • The 50th anniversary of united Jerusalem
  • The 100th anniversary of Balfour declaration
  • The 120th anniversary of the Maccabi Zionist Congress

The goal

  • To preserve the beautiful memories
  • To show the impact of experiencing the core values of Maccabi
  • To present the influence of personal dreams on different Jewish communities
  • To publish an honest book filled with deep emotions and thought-provoking decisions of people inspired by belonging to a real community 

$210,000 needed:

  • To publish the book in high quality formats
  • To print the book in 4400 copies
  • To translate and publish it in 2 languages: Hebrew and English

What is it exactly about? Why is it interesting to you?

  • Provides more than 100 personal stories
  • Offers honest, deep recollections from the first (!) Maccabiah athletes, Para-Maccabiah and top athletes, community leaders, volunteers and families competing together
  • Speaks about life-changing decisions made because of the impact of the Maccabiah (Aliya, Zionism, marriage, carrier, community work)
  • Highlights the effect of the Maccabiah on individuals and on vibrant and lost Jewish communities
  • Presents love stories
  • Contains the best pictures of all the Maccabiah events 
  • Presents memories from the following 36 countries

Worldwide spirit

More than 30 countries from all over Europe, South-America, USA, Africa and Israel.

This multinational community put its heart into this book.

Each person, each community, each country contributed to this wonderful global masterpiece that truly represents the intense emotional background that each Jewish person coming from the diaspora and from Israel feels in the bottom of their heart.

World famous, top Jewish athletes & inspirational community leaders 

  • Olympians (Jeff Bukantz - fencing / Noam Gershony - wheelchair tennis / Andrea Murez - swimming / Neta Rivkin - rhythmic gymnastics...)  
  • World champions (Jason Lezak, Lenny Krayzelburg)
  • Leaders of Maccabi from all over the world
  • Famous coaches (David Blatt - NBA, Maccabi TLV...)

The stories of the inspirational characters bring this book to life! Personal, emotional experiences you have never heard before! Each story is an unforgettable memory!

The Hall of the Maccabiah is a unique memory book and photo album that guarantees the continuity of the Maccabi spirit by preserving the stories and spreading the core values of Maccabi.

These memories are building bridges across the Jewish communities in the world.

No doubt that this book will change you forever as the Maccabiah has changed the lives of thousands of people.

Personal message from the author, Yaarit Rahamin:

"How I got involved in Maccabi? Strangely all the roads had led to Rome before I wrote the powerful and inspirational book, the Hall of the Maccabiah.

In 2004 in Israel I took a broadcast course specializing in radio and TV.  As my final test I was given a studio assignment: I had to act like I was broadcasting from the Stadio Olimpico di Roma. At the time I didn't know that sport and Rome will play such a special role in my life. 

Few years later I moved to Rome. 

In 2011, on the Independence Day of Israel I was walking in the Jewish ghetto in Rome and something caught my eyes. I saw the symbol of Maccabi. I went closer and met Fabrizio Della Rocca, the President of Maccabi Rome. He gave me a T-shirt of Maccabi Italia and immediately I felt the part of the community. 

After a while you cannot live in Rome without writing. I felt that the old stones were speaking to me. I got inspired in the beautiful alleys of Trastevere quarter and I started to practice writing. I became a journalist. I have been working for the Israeli leading daily newspaper Yedioth Ahronoth (ynet).

In 2014 in Rome I took part in a leadership seminar called Future Leaders Forum organized by the European Maccabi Confederation. I met wonderful speakers, life coaches and community leaders. I got a vision. I felt extremely inspired. I took part in many organizations and committees before but non of them was like Maccabi.

Maccabi with all its inspirational athletes and its intelligent, warm-hearted and committed volunteers just simply fascinated me and motivated me to do something meaningful for a community. I felt in my heart that Maccabi is the right place for me as a young professional, as a Jewish woman and also as a runner.  

I kept taking part in the FLF seminars. In 2015 I participated in the Maccabi World Union Congress which was held parallel with the FLF Global Seminar. The Gala Night of the Congress was in Jerusalem. Andrea Murez, the famous Israeli swimmer who competed in the Olympic Games in Rio in 2016 went to the stage and announced the logo of Maccabiah 2017. In that moment the idea to write a book about Maccabiah was born in my mind. 

I made a life-changing decision. I dedicated my time for writing and only for writing. I contacted to the top, most famous Jewish athletes, coaches, all-time superstars. I made interviews with talented, successful Maccabi sportsmen whose life was completely changed by the Maccabiah. I got inspired by Maccabi leaders all around the world. I was touched by the families who have connection to Maccabiah generation to generation. I gained energy from each person I spoke with. My life was filled with love and motivations every day through the commitment and the inspirational stories they shared with me during the interviews. I found their bound with Judaism and Maccabi to be incredibly special and strong. I realized we all represent the core values of Maccabi and that is why we all create a family together.  

These people, actually you, my dear Reader taught me that everything is possible. We are all here to inspire each other and lead our life to the direction we dream of. The stories of these wonderful people make the essence of the book."

הסופרת: יערית רחמים

הודעה אישית מהסופרת, יערית רחמים:

"איך החל הקשר שלי עם מכבי? באופן מקרי כל הדרכים הובילו אותי לרומא לפני שכתבתי ספר עוצמתי ומלא השראה: היכל המכביה.

בשנת 2004 למדתי בקורס שדרי טלוויזיה ורדיו, עבודת הסיום היתה לשדר מעין משחק,  והמקום שבחרתי באופן ספונטני היה לא אחר מאשר האצטדיון האולימפיקו ברומא. באותם ימים לא תיארתי לעצמי שהשילוב של ספורט ורומא ימלאו תפקיד כה משמעותי בחיי.

כעבור מספר שנים עברתי לרומא.

בשנת 2011 ביום העצמאות של ישראל טיילתי בגטו היהודי ברומא, ומשהו לכד את עיניי, ראיתי את הסמל של מכבי. התקרבתי ופגשתי את פבריציו דלה רוקה נשיא מכבי רומא שנתן לי במתנה חולצה של מכבי איטליה ומאותו הרגע הרגשתי חלק מהקהילה.

אי אפשר לגור ברומא מבלי לכתוב. חשתי את המילים מגיחות מהאבנים ההיסטוריות והעתיקות, קיבלתי השראה מהסמטאות היפיפיות של רובע טרסטברה בעיר והתחלתי להתאמן בכתיבה. לאחר זמן מה הפכתי לעיתונאית ואני כותבת בידיעות אחרונות.

בשנת 2014 ברומא לקחתי חלק בסמינר על מנהיגות עם קבוצה שנקראת: פורום המנהיגים העתידיים, שאורגן בידי קונפדרציית מכבי אירופה. פגשתי שם נואמים נהדרים, מאמנים לחיים ומנהיגי קהילות שכל כך גרמו לי להשראה. לקחתי חלק בהרבה ארגונים וועדות לפני ואף אחד מהם לא היה כמו מכבי.      

מכבי עם כל מתנדביה המחויבים לה עם לב כל כך רחב, הספורטאים מעוררי השראה, הכל יחד הקסים ומילא אותי במוטיבציה לעשות דבר משמעותי לקהילה. חשתי בליבי שמכבי היא המקום הנכון בשבילי, כאשת קריירה, כיהודיה וגם כחובבת ריצה.

המשכתי להגיע גם לסמינרים הבאים של אותה קבוצה. בשנת 2015 השתתפתי בקונגרס מכבי העולמי שהיה מקביל לסמינר העולמי של פורום המנהיגים הצעירים. הערב החגיגי של הקונגרס נערך בירושלים, אנדראה מורז השחיינית שייצגה את ישראל במשחקים האולימפיים בריו 2016, עלתה לבמה וחשפה את הלוגו של המכביה ה-20. באותו הרגע עלה במוחי הרעיון, לכתוב את הספר על המכביה.

לקחתי החלטה משמעותית בחיי, הקדשתי את כל זמני לכתיבה בלבד. יצרתי קשר עם ספורטאים יהודים המפורסמים ביותר, מאמנים, הטובים ביותר בכל הזמנים. ראיונות עם כוכבים, ספורטאי מכבי מצליחים שחייהם השתנו בגלל המכביה. קיבלתי השראה ממנהיגים במכבי מכל רחבי העולם. התרגשתי מאוד מסיפורן של משפחות הקשורות במכבי מדור לדור. נמלאתי באנרגיה מכל אדם ששוחחתי איתו. חיי התמלאו באהבה ומוטיבציה בכל יום מבעד לסיפורים מלאי השראה ומחויבות שהם חלקו איתי במהלך הראיונות. מצאתי שהקשר עם יהדות ומכבי הוא מיוחד מאוד וחזק. הבנתי שאנחנו כולנו מייצגים את הערכים של מכבי ולכן כולנו יחד גם יוצרים משפחה אחת.

האנשים האלה, הם למעשה אתה, קורא יקר, אתה מראה לי שהכל הוא אפשרי. אנחנו כולנו כאן מעוררי השראה האחד מהשני ואנחנו מובילים את חיינו אל הכיוון שאליו אנחנו חולמים. הסיפורים של האנשים הנפלאים האלו, הם המהות של הספר."

המלצות:

"הספר צריך להיות חובת קריאה בבתי ספר"

"הספר נכתב מהלב. כשקראתי את הסיפורים הרגשתי שכאילו הייתי במכביה, להקשיב לכמות של אוהדים צועקים באצטדיון, לחוות את האהבה הרבה של הקהילות שחולקות את שימחת הספורטאים שזכו במדליות עבור המדינות שלהם. המילים מתעוררות לחיים בספר".

"הסופרת, יערית חשה באופן אישי אחריות להנציח את הזיכרונות המדהימים של אירועי המכביה לדורות הבאים.היא עזבה את עבודתה כדי להשקיע את כל זמנה רק בכתיבה. היא השקיעה את חייה לכתוב ולפרסם את הספר. היא הנשמה של הספר. המחויבות שלה מעוררת השראה אמיתית ומקור של אהבה בשבילי בכל יום. אני מרגישה שנפל בחלקי הכבוד שיכולתי להשתתף ביצירת הקמפיין הזה." ברברה בוריאן

"נהגתי להשתתף כספורטאי במכביה, היום אני לוקח חלק כמתנדב ונהנה. מעולם לא זכיתי במדליה אבל היה זה הכרחי בשבילי להיות שם כיהודי גאה שמאמין בכוח של הספורט וקהילה. הספר הזה מייצג עבורי מה הם באמת הערכים בחיים."

Exciting and moving memories about the Maccabiah.Make the inspirational stories last forever.Let's publish the Hall of the Maccabiah!Ver el vídeo en español! Haga clic AQUÍ!The Hall of the Maccabiah is the first book that includes over 100 fantastic stories about the world's largest Jewish sport competition, the Maccabiah.The book was created for:
The 20th anniversary of Maccabiah, 
The 50th anniversary of united Jerusalem
The 100th anniversary of Balfour declaration
The 120th anniversary of the Maccabi Zionist Congress
The goal
To preserve the beautiful memories
To show the impact of experiencing the core values of Maccabi
To present the influence of personal dreams on different Jewish communities
To publish an honest book filled with deep emotions and thought-provoking decisions of people inspired by belonging to a real community 
$210,000 needed:
To publish the book in high quality formats
To print the book in 4400 copies
To translate and publish it in 2 languages: Hebrew and English
What is it exactly about? Why is it interesting to you?
Provides more than 100 personal stories
Offers honest, deep recollections from the first (!) Maccabiah athletes, Para-Maccabiah and top athletes, community leaders, volunteers and families competing together
Speaks about life-changing decisions made because of the impact of the Maccabiah (Aliya, Zionism, marriage, carrier, community work)
Highlights the effect of the Maccabiah on individuals and on vibrant and lost Jewish communities
Presents love stories
Contains the best pictures of all the Maccabiah events 
Presents memories from the following 36 countries
Worldwide spiritMore than 30 countries from all over Europe, South-America, USA, Africa and Israel.This multinational community put its heart into this book.Each person, each community, each country contributed to this wonderful global masterpiece that truly represents the intense emotional background that each Jewish person coming from the diaspora and from Israel feels in the bottom of their heart.World famous, top Jewish athletes & inspirational community leaders 
Olympians (Jeff Bukantz - fencing / Noam Gershony - wheelchair tennis / Andrea Murez - swimming / Neta Rivkin - rhythmic gymnastics...)  
World champions (Jason Lezak, Lenny Krayzelburg)
Leaders of Maccabi from all over the world
Famous coaches (David Blatt - NBA, Maccabi TLV...)
Maccabi members (Judith Deutsch-Haspel - Hakoah Vienna / Gabor Rajna - Oscar for Son of Saul,,,)
The stories of the inspirational characters bring this book to life! Personal, emotional experiences you have never heard before! Each story is an unforgettable memory!The Hall of the Maccabiah is a unique memory book and photo album that guarantees the continuity of the Maccabi spirit by preserving the stories and spreading the core values of Maccabi.These memories are building bridges across the Jewish communities in the world.No doubt that this book will change you forever as the Maccabiah has changed the lives of thousands of people.Memorial chapter:The book also commemorates all those athletes who were persecuted or killed for being Jewish.  Their tragic stories were evoked by their loved ones.Quotes from the book:Over 100 touching and inspirational interviews were made with the lovely members of the Maccabi community!Costs and product details:The pre-sales and donations are needed to cover all the expenses and to publish the book according to the conditions below. We are doing everything possible to make it happen!Hardcover: at least 250 pagesLanguage: English and HebrewPublishing time: 2017, before the 20th MaccabiahAuthor: Yaarit Rahamim Personal message from the author, Yaarit Rahamin:"How I got involved in Maccabi? Strangely all the roads had led to Rome before I wrote the powerful and inspirational book, the Hall of the Maccabiah.In 2004 in Israel I took a broadcast course specializing in radio and TV.  As my final test I was given a studio assignment: I had to act like I was broadcasting from the Stadio Olimpico di Roma. At the time I didn't know that sport and Rome will play such a special role in my life. Few years later I moved to Rome. In 2011, on the Independence Day of Israel I was walking in the Jewish ghetto in Rome and something caught my eyes. I saw the symbol of Maccabi. I went closer and met Fabrizio Della Rocca, the President of Maccabi Rome. He gave me a T-shirt of Maccabi Italia and immediately I felt the part of the community. After a while you cannot live in Rome without writing. I felt that the old stones were speaking to me. I got inspired in the beautiful alleys of Trastevere quarter and I started to practice writing. I became a journalist. I have been working for the Israeli leading daily newspaper Yedioth Ahronoth (ynet).In 2014 in Rome I took part in a leadership seminar called Future Leaders Forum organized by the European Maccabi Confederation. I met wonderful speakers, life coaches and community leaders. I got a vision. I felt extremely inspired. I took part in many organizations and committees before but non of them was like Maccabi. Maccabi with all its inspirational athletes and its intelligent, warm-hearted and committed volunteers just simply fascinated me and motivated me to do something meaningful for a community. I felt in my heart that Maccabi is the right place for me as a young professional, as a Jewish woman and also as a runner.  I kept taking part in the FLF seminars. In 2015 I participated in the Maccabi World Union Congress which was held parallel with the FLF Global Seminar. The Gala Night of the Congress was in Jerusalem. Andrea Murez, the famous Israeli swimmer who competed in the Olympic Games in Rio in 2016 went to the stage and announced the logo of Maccabiah 2017. In that moment the idea to write a book about Maccabiah was born in my mind. I made a life-changing decision. I dedicated my time for writing and only for writing. I contacted to the top, most famous Jewish athletes, coaches, all-time superstars. I made interviews with talented, successful Maccabi sportsmen whose life was completely changed by the Maccabiah. I got inspired by Maccabi leaders all around the world. I was touched by the families who have connection to Maccabiah generation to generation. I gained energy from each person I spoke with. My life was filled with love and motivations every day through the commitment and the inspirational stories they shared with me during the interviews. I found their bound with Judaism and Maccabi to be incredibly special and strong. I realized we all represent the core values of Maccabi and that is why we all create a family together.  These people, actually you, my dear Reader taught me that everything is possible. We are all here to inspire each other and lead our life to the direction we dream of. The stories of these wonderful people make the essence of the book."Recommendations:"This book should be a compulsory reading in schools."​"This book was written from the heart. While reading the stories I felt like being in the Maccabiah, listening the mass of fans screaming in the stadium, experiencing the incredible love of communities and sharing the happiness of the athletes who gained medals for their countries. The words come to life in this book.""The author, Yaarit feels personaly responsible for preserving the amazing memories of the Maccabiah events to the next generations. She left her job to spend her time only with writing. She dedicated her life to write and publish this book. She is the soul of the book. Her commitment is a true inspiration and a source of love to me every single day. I feel honored that I could contribute to create this campaign ." Barbara Burian"I used to participate as an athlete in Maccabiah, now I take part as a volunteer and fan. I never won any medals but it was essential to me to be there as a proud Jew who belives in the power of sport and community. This book represents me what the real values are in the life." Other Ways You Can Help

עזור לסיפורים מעוררי השראה להישאר לעד! בואו ונפרסם את היכל המכביה!הספר "היכל המכביה" הוא הראשון המכיל מעל ל- 100 סיפורים וראיונות מרגשים על אירוע הספורט היהודי הגדול בעולם-המכביה. הספר נכתב לכבוד:המכביה ה-20.-- 50 שנה לאיחוד העיר ירושלים.- 100 שנה להצהרת בלפור.- 120שנה לקונגרס הציוני הראשון.המטרה:לשמר את הזיכרונות היפים.--להראות את השפעת מכבי וערכיה. להראות את ההשפעתם של חלומות אינדיבידואלים מקהילות יהודיות שונות.--לפרסם ספר המכיל חוויות מרגשות, ומחשבות המובילות להחלטות הרות גורל של אנשים שקיבלו השראה מהיותם שייכים לקהילה.  $210000 צריך:- כדי לפרסם ספר המעוצב באיכות גבוהה ומהודרת.-כדי להדפיס 4400 העתקים-לתרגם ולהדפיס בשתי שפות: עברית ואנגלית.על מה הספר, למה הוא מעניין גם לך:הוא מכיל יותר ממאה סיפורים אישיים--אוסף של זיכרונות החל מהמכביה הראשונה של ספורטאים, אלופים אולימפיים ופראלימפיים, מנהיגי קהילות, מתנדבים ומשפחות המתחרות יחדיו. -הספר מדבר על החלטות הרות גורל בעקבות ההשתתפות במכביה: עליה לישראל, ציונות, נישואים, קריירה, פעילות בקהילה. מבליט את השפעת המכביה על יחידים וקהילות יהודיות אבודות.-סיפורי אהבה שנרקמו בעקבות המכביה.-תמונות המרהיבות ביותר מהמכביות.--זיכרונות של מרואיינים מ- 36 המדינות הבאות:רוח מכבית חובקת עולם:-מרואיינים מעל לשלושים מדינות: מכל רחבי אירופה, דרום אמריקה, אפריקה, ארצות הברית, ישראל ועוד.הקהילה הרב לאומית שמה את ליבה בספר.--כל אדם, כל קהילה, כל מדינה תרמה ליצירת המופת העולמית הזאת, שמייצגת באופן אמיתי את הרקע הרגשי החזק של כל יהודי המגיע מהתפוצות לישראל ומתרגש מאוד.ספורטאים מובילים ומנהיגי קהילות מעוררי השראה מרחבי העולםאולימפיים: (ג'ף בוקנץ-סייף, נועם גרשוני-טניס בכיסאות גלגלים, אנדראה מורז-שחייה, נטע ריבקין-התעמלות אמנותית...)אלופי עולם (לני קרייזלברג, ג'יסון ליזאק...)מנהיגי מכבי מכל רחבי העולם.מאמנים מפורסמים (דיוויד בלאט...)סיפורים מרגשים נוספים על הגיבורה יהודית דויטש-הספל שהחרימה את המשחקים האולימפיים בברלין 1936 ועל גאבור ריינה ממכבי הונגריה מפיק הסרט "הבן של שאול" זוכה פרס האוסקר, ועוד.הסיפורים המרגשים ומעוררי ההשראה של הדמויות מביאים את הספר לחיים! אישיים וחוויות מרגשות שלא שמעתם לפני! כל סיפור הוא זיכרון בלתי נשכח!היכל המכביה הוא ספר זיכרונות ייחודי עשיר בתמונות שמבטיח את ההמשכיות של רוח המכבית על ידי שימורם של הסיפורים ומפיץ את הערכים הקיימים במכבי.הזיכרונות האלו בונים גשרים בין קהילות יהודיות בעולם.ללא כל ספק הספר "היכל המכביה" יגרום בך לשינוי שישפיע עליך לעד, כפי שהמכביה השפיע על חייהם של אלפי אנשים.פרק זיכרון:הפרק מנציח את סיפורם הטראגי של ספורטאים שנרצחו על היותם יהודים. ציטוטים מהספר:"הייתי גאה מאוד לראות את בני צועד יחד איתי בטקס הפתיחה.""מצאתי את אהבתי במכביה.""בגלל המכביה החלטתי לעשות עליה, גם אם לא כולם יכולים לעבור לישראל המכביה לחלוטין שינתה את חייהם של אנשים רבים." "אני מרגיש גאווה להשתתף במכביה, אני גאה לייצג את הזהות היהודית שלי ואת מדינתנו."מעל 100 ראיונות נוגעים ללב ומעוררי השראה נערכו עם חברים יקרים בקהילת מכבי.עלויות ופרטים:המכירה המוקדמת והתרומות הנם כדי לכסות את כל ההוצאות ולפרסם את הספר לפי התנאים המצוינים מטה. אנחנו נעשה ככל שניתן בכדי לגרום לכך לקרות!כריכה קשיחה ומהודרת, ולפחות כ- 250 עמודים באיכות גבוהה.שפות: עברית ואנגלית.הוצאתו לאור: במהלך 2017 ולפני המכביה העשרים.הסופרת: יערית רחמיםהודעה אישית מהסופרת, יערית רחמים:"איך החל הקשר שלי עם מכבי? באופן מקרי כל הדרכים הובילו אותי לרומא לפני שכתבתי ספר עוצמתי ומלא השראה: היכל המכביה.בשנת 2004 למדתי בקורס שדרי טלוויזיה ורדיו, עבודת הסיום היתה לשדר מעין משחק,  והמקום שבחרתי באופן ספונטני היה לא אחר מאשר האצטדיון האולימפיקו ברומא. באותם ימים לא תיארתי לעצמי שהשילוב של ספורט ורומא ימלאו תפקיד כה משמעותי בחיי.כעבור מספר שנים עברתי לרומא.בשנת 2011 ביום העצמאות של ישראל טיילתי בגטו היהודי ברומא, ומשהו לכד את עיניי, ראיתי את הסמל של מכבי. התקרבתי ופגשתי את פבריציו דלה רוקה נשיא מכבי רומא שנתן לי במתנה חולצה של מכבי איטליה ומאותו הרגע הרגשתי חלק מהקהילה. אי אפשר לגור ברומא מבלי לכתוב. חשתי את המילים מגיחות מהאבנים ההיסטוריות והעתיקות, קיבלתי השראה מהסמטאות היפיפיות של רובע טרסטברה בעיר והתחלתי להתאמן בכתיבה. לאחר זמן מה הפכתי לעיתונאית ואני כותבת בידיעות אחרונות. בשנת 2014 ברומא לקחתי חלק בסמינר על מנהיגות עם קבוצה שנקראת: פורום המנהיגים העתידיים, שאורגן בידי קונפדרציית מכבי אירופה. פגשתי שם נואמים נהדרים, מאמנים לחיים ומנהיגי קהילות שכל כך גרמו לי להשראה. לקחתי חלק בהרבה ארגונים וועדות לפני ואף אחד מהם לא היה כמו מכבי.      מכבי עם כל מתנדביה המחויבים לה עם לב כל כך רחב, הספורטאים מעוררי השראה, הכל יחד הקסים ומילא אותי במוטיבציה לעשות דבר משמעותי לקהילה. חשתי בליבי שמכבי היא המקום הנכון בשבילי, כאשת קריירה, כיהודיה וגם כחובבת ריצה.המשכתי להגיע גם לסמינרים הבאים של אותה קבוצה. בשנת 2015 השתתפתי בקונגרס מכבי העולמי שהיה מקביל לסמינר העולמי של פורום המנהיגים הצעירים. הערב החגיגי של הקונגרס נערך בירושלים, אנדראה מורז השחיינית שייצגה את ישראל במשחקים האולימפיים בריו 2016, עלתה לבמה וחשפה את הלוגו של המכביה ה-20. באותו הרגע עלה במוחי הרעיון, לכתוב את הספר על המכביה.לקחתי החלטה משמעותית בחיי, הקדשתי את כל זמני לכתיבה בלבד. יצרתי קשר עם ספורטאים יהודים המפורסמים ביותר, מאמנים, הטובים ביותר בכל הזמנים. ראיונות עם כוכבים, ספורטאי מכבי מצליחים שחייהם השתנו בגלל המכביה. קיבלתי השראה ממנהיגים במכבי מכל רחבי העולם. התרגשתי מאוד מסיפורן של משפחות הקשורות במכבי מדור לדור. נמלאתי באנרגיה מכל אדם ששוחחתי איתו. חיי התמלאו באהבה ומוטיבציה בכל יום מבעד לסיפורים מלאי השראה ומחויבות שהם חלקו איתי במהלך הראיונות. מצאתי שהקשר עם יהדות ומכבי הוא מיוחד מאוד וחזק. הבנתי שאנחנו כולנו מייצגים את הערכים של מכבי ולכן כולנו יחד גם יוצרים משפחה אחת.האנשים האלה, הם למעשה אתה, קורא יקר, אתה מראה לי שהכל הוא אפשרי. אנחנו כולנו כאן מעוררי השראה האחד מהשני ואנחנו מובילים את חיינו אל הכיוון שאליו אנחנו חולמים. הסיפורים של האנשים הנפלאים האלו, הם המהות של הספר."המלצות:"הספר צריך להיות חובת קריאה בבתי ספר""הספר נכתב מהלב. כשקראתי את הסיפורים הרגשתי שכאילו הייתי במכביה, להקשיב לכמות של story:
"To take a photograph is to participate in another person's mortality, vulnerability, mutability. Precisely by slicing out this moment and freezing it, all photographs testify to time's relentless melt.” -
Susan Sontag

We learn most - about ourselves and others -  by looking into the eyes of another human being. I want to help people to reconnect with the raw, largely untouched, beautiful place of humankind’s birth. I cannot think of a better way to accomplish that than to focus on the literal interpretation of birthing humankind: African women. 

My photographs will serve as an opportunity to look into an African’s woman’s eyes, celebrate her, and know Africa better than before. This will contribute to a better understanding of Africa and less discrimination and prejudice. I feel inspired to create this because I’m an artist, but even more so I feel devoted to creating this because I am human.

Setting off on adventures with only my backpack and camera, my love of photography evolved alongside my love of travel. My experience as a professional photographer over the past 8 years has lead me around the world--from my home country of Brazil to the streets of Europe, the Middle East, and Asia. I have found that wherever I travel, I am drawn to photographing the women I meet. I attribute this tendency due to growing up surrounded by women; my dressmaker mother and all of her clientele.  This exposed me to the beautifully complex emotional range of women’s personalities, as well as a few core traits that seem to unite them as women.  Throughout my travels and work as a portrait photographer for a reputable newspaper in Brazil, I have built up a vast portfolio of beautiful portraits that audiences across the globe have enjoyed 

Nadja Sophie

You can see more of my work on GOOLE IMAGES and Also on 500px.com

My journey will begin in Cairo, where I will buy a cheap motorcycle. Over the course of 5 months, I plan to travel the length of Africa. I’ll be photographing women from Egypt, Sudan, Ethiopia, Kenya, Uganda, Congo, Rwanda, Tanzania, Malawi, Zambia, Botswana, Namibia and South Africa; to reflect the strong subcultures evident across the continent. 

And as if the stars weren’t already aligning for this beautiful project, 2017 will be 40 years of the  “International Women’s Day” when United Nations in General Assembly in 1977 adopted a resolution proclaiming a United Nations Day for Women’s Rights and International Peace to be observed on any day of the year - What better way to honor this 40 years  than to be creating art that will bring an audience to countless women’s stories throughout Africa?


INTERACTION

All the backers and sponsors of this project will be in direct communication with me through the project’s Facebook group and Whatsapp. Backers who’ve committed a certain level of support will be granted full communication access with me at all times. In addition to documenting my experience on the website, I will also maintain regular updates on Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook.. It’s incredibly important to me that you, the backers and sponsors, are integral part of this epic journey.


ARTISTIC CONCEPT

This photographic expedition will not only capture the beauty and diversity of African women, but also examine what it means to be an African woman in contemporary society; their individual lives and their places within their communities. The finished product I create will be deeply rooted in the belief that Africa is misunderstood and the desire to foster understanding and empathy.

Every photograph will be shot through the metaphorical lense of connecting women from seemingly different worlds by highlighting what makes each one unique. The photographs, accompanied by concise captions, will attempt tell the stories of these individuals while exploring the many identities and cultures of African women.

IMPACT 

My desired impact of this photo collection is to challenge preconceived notions and false beliefs about Africa and the women who live there. More developed parts of the world often see Africa as somehow being “less than” simply because it has LESS OF what modernize societies have. However, I believe this is a gross and potentially dangerous mistake. I wish for this project to open minds and lead them to a re-evaluation of what they believe they know. It is easy - human nature, even - to falsely judge what we do not understand.

My goal for the impact of this project is to deliver understanding where it is needed. Prejudice cannot live long in an environment where there is understanding. The photographs will be published in a beautiful book that will serve as an educational tool, as well as a perfect addition to any art lover’s home. Additionally, in hopes of increasing the impact of this project, the photographs will be entered into contemporary galleries across the world including New York, London, and across Asia.

For the art-lovers out there, this project will be designed to allow you to interact with me firsthand as I journey across Africa. This means that you are not only part of the product, you’re part of the process. You’ll have opportunities to appreciate the creation of art just as you appreciate the art itself. All backers will receive a digital copy of the book in PDF format, and the credit and gratitude for being an integral part of a photographic lesson that will impact audiences throughout the world.

The Book Inicial format and design (It might change)

  • 360 x 270mm (paper size) Portrait format. 
  • 300 pages, 
  • Photographs to be printed on high quality paper, finished with a spot varnish. 
  • language - English

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Time Schedule 

Start on the 20th of December. The full time schedule can be view the this link
https://teamup.com/ksb5a24ae0e49520d6

Budget distribution 6 month Estimate

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Risks

The primary risk is my safety - accidents, diseases (etc.). My plan for tackling these challenges is: use my travel smarts, be aware of my surroundings, and take precautions to lead a healthy lifestyle no matter where I am. Having traveled through other countries that are universally considered to be highly risky travel destinations, I’m beyond confident in my ability to navigate this journey through Africa safely and successfully.

My plan for tackling these challenges is: use my travel smarts, be aware of my surroundings, and take precautions to lead a healthy lifestyle no matter where I am. Having traveled through other countries that are universally considered to be highly risky travel destinations, I’m beyond confident in my ability to navigate this journey through Africa safely and successfully.

story:
Mud and Bug both love the same thing: hiking. Certain that this passion can transcend the complications of their relationship, they set off on a journey to walk from Canada to Mexico, 2,660 miles on the Pacific Crest Trail. Together, they brave snow-covered slopes in the Cascades of Washington, walk through lava fields in Oregon, navigate a smoky haze of wildfire in Northern California, climb eleven thousand foot mountain passes in the High Sierra and revel in the desolate beauty of the Mojave desert in fall. 


Shortly into the trek, they find that navigating their changing relationship is just as hard as navigating the wilderness. There's no doubt that each will complete the journey, but will they finish together?

What's this all about?

Some say it's the best hiking memoir ever written. I can tell you for sure, it's the best hiking memoir I've ever written! I never dreamed of being an author, but just started writing one day and this is what happened. It's a story about going on a long walk with a friend. Sometimes it's great. Sometimes it's hard. But it's always worth it. 

To kick off my book launch, I'm selling signed copies with a bunch of other perks, too. 

The Prizes! 

As some of you may have figured out by now, I wear many hats. Some of these hats include the writer and hiker hats. Others have required a bit more education and training like the dietitian hat and the plant-based chef hat. You have the opportunity to get a signed copy of my book, PLUS some dehydrated backpacking meals, or even a nutrition consultation. Whatever sounds most appealing to you. 

Other Ways to Help

If you are not compelled by these prizes but still want to help, you can always subscribe to my blog and become a loyal reader, tell a friend about the book, or just send some positive energy my direction. I appreciate all the support I can get.
Thank you!

story:
numaH is a collection of confessions that originally were addressed to no one but in the end has touched everyone it has come into contact with. It is more than a book, it is a manifestation of courage, vulnerability and of the human spirit, just trying to be understood by being honest with oneself. As a result, this book has opened and activated entire realms of possibility in people who find themselves on a similar path of wanting to know themselves. It is a ripple effect, more than just a product; it is permission given to people, allowing them to be themselves, and to trust that its okay to be as raw and real as possible. numaH taps into the unconscious collective, presenting parts of ourselves to us that have been yearning for love, but that shame or fear has tried to bury and hide. numaH is an opportunity to self-reflect, to self-love, and to know that you are not alone. 

numaH is the raw documentation of one person’s experience of being human, that all human beings can draw from and relate to. In effect, numaH is more than any book or any collection of random thoughts, it is a testament to the human spirit, and it deserves to be shared with the world.

story:
Waves

My name is Tara Jean. I am an Ottawa based Child and Youth Worker who has a side passion of writing. Writing has been part of my life since childhood when I would write short stories and mediocre poems. It has continued to become and increasingly important part of my life. Waves is the first novel I have written with the intent to publish!

Contributors who support this project will allow me to:

  • Publish the novel in an eco-friendly manner. 
  • Pay a local artist to illustrate the entire novel thus increasing the readers experience.
  • Pay shipping costs
  • Donate 10% of the raised funds to The Childrens Hospital of Eastern Ontario’s [CHEO’s] mental health unit. (The more the better!)

What happens if I DON’T reach my goal?

  • Less copies of waves
  • Less quality printing 
  • Less $ to donate to CHEO 

*When I struggled in my teens with depression, I was admitted to CHEO and received quality care. With recent budget cuts, I want to help CHEO be able to continue providing the best care for children & youth who are struggling.

The Impact

Through my teen years, I struggled severely with depression. Writing was my constant saviour.  For that reason, this project is exceptionally close to my heart. Waves allows readers into my personal struggles, triumphs and all of the spaces between. While writing waves, I highlighted the inner strength we all have while still acknowledging how hard it can be to access that strength at times. Waves will create a sense of support for readers and, hopefully, leave them feeling grounded.

Other Ways You Can Help:

I understand not everyone can contribute and that’s totally okay. Here are some free ways to help:

  • Share my campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and other social media platforms. Don’t forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • DONATE prizes and perks :) 

Thank you

You all have no idea how much this novel means to me and how deeply important I feel it is to publish novels surrounding mental health. Your support does not go unnoticed!

*Book art by Corinne Blouin-Hudon, animation and music by Alison McCarthy

story:
La asociación Colombiana de Lacrosse fue creada en el 2012, con el anhelo cumplir los sueños de jóvenes deportistas que desean tener la oportunidad de representar y dejar en alto el nombre de Colombia en eventos de talla mundial.

Desde entonces hemos puesto toda nuestra energía en la conformación de un equipo femenino de élite donde las jugadoras puedan crecer y desarrollar sus habilidades individuales y con el equipo. Para las jóvenes que se han unido a esta iniciativa, el Lacrosse se ha convertido en una parte muy importante de sus vidas y de su día a día, haciendo que cada día los sueños sean más grandes y las metas más altas.

Gracias al compromiso y al arduo trabajo que llevamos realizando, logramos conseguir un cupo para el mundial de mayores de Lacrosse que se llevará a cabo a finales de julio del 2017 en Londres.

Ahora tenemos el deber de cumplir el sueño de representar a nuestro país y dejar el nombre de Colombia en alto frente a más de 30 países que estarán allí compitiendo con nosotras y para lograr este sueño te necesitamos a TI.

¡Tú tienes mil maneras de ayudarnos!

Puedes mover nuestras publicaciones en redes sociales para que más personas apoyen este sueño, puedes contactarnos si quieres patrocinarnos o contarnos si conoces a alguien que esté interesado en ayudarnos o darnos un aporte económico de cualquiera de las opciones que puedes encontrar acá.

Nosotras estamos soñando y preparándonos para cumplir esta gran meta, has parte de esto ayudándonos y haciendo que nuestros esfuerzos no sean en vano y en el 2017 te demostraremos los resultados de tu aporte esforzándonos en Londres para ganar.

Allí somos las únicas representantes de Latinoamérica con experiencia y reconocimiento internacional, al llegar allí como deportistas dedicadas no sólo le daremos una cara diferente a Colombia sino a toda América latina, demostrando que podemos lograr lo que nos proponemos porque #SiSePuede.

Asimismo, nuestra participación en el mundial dará la oportunidad a más jóvenes de disfrutar este deporte y hacer que sea reconocido a nivel nacional e internacional permitiendo a las jugadoras desarrollar su crecimiento deportivo y académico.

Al apoyarnos, no solo nos acercarás un poco más a Londres, sino que además entrarás en la familia de Lacrosse femenino y podrás compartir con nosotras nuestros triunfos y apoyarnos en los momentos menos felices.

Todo tu aporte se destinará a cumplir nuestro sueño, comprando los implementos necesarios para jugar en el mundial y pagando los gastos del viaje de varias niñas alrededor de Colombia.

Uno de nuestros más grandes sueños es tener un centro deportivo para organizar una liga y así llegar a las personas más vulnerables. Desde nuestros entrenamientos diarios realizamos visitas a colegios y a lugares con mayor afectación social, para empezar a practicar y mostrarles que el Lacrosse en Colombia ¡sí existe!

Con nuestras actividades le brindamos a otros jóvenes un ambiente acogedor, los alejamos de malos hábitos y fomentamos el libre desarrollo de pensamiento y personalidad haciendo que todos seamos una gran familia que cree en la importancia del deporte y de un equipo de Lacrosse en Colombia.

Nuestro reto más grande, aparte de ir a Londres, es darnos a conocer ya que no muchas personas saben que en Colombia existe el Lacrosse y mucho menos que existe un equipo femenino de Lacrosse.

Somos un equipo joven con un gran sueño y necesitamos de tu ayuda para demostrarle a todo el mundo que sí hay un equipo de Lacrosse en Colombia.

Queremos mostrar que el Lacrosse no es solo un deporte más sino un estilo de vida  y una gran familia que cada día crece más.

No contamos con entrenadores de tiempo completo pues entre nosotras mismas hemos buscado la manera de tener disciplina, entrenarnos y darlo todo pero ha sido un gran desafío que hemos sobrepasado alcanzando grandes logros como la participación el mundial sub 19 en el que mostramos tan solo un de lo que somos capaces.

________________________________________________________

The Colombian association of Lacrosse was created in 2012, with the desire to fulfill the dreams of young athletes who wish to have the opportunity to represent and leave the name of Colombia high in world-class events.

Since then we have put all our energy into the formation of an elite female team where the players can grow and develop their individual skills. For the young women who have joined this initiative, Lacrosse has become a very important part of their lives, creating every day bigger dreams and higher goals.

Thanks to the commitment and the hard work that we have been carrying out, we managed to get a place for the World Championship of Lacrosse that will happen in late July 2017 in London.

Now we have the duty to fulfill the dream of representing our country and leave the name of Colombia really high. We will be there competing in front of more than 30 countries and we will give all of us, but to achieve this dream WE NEED YOU.

You have a thousand ways to help us!

You can share our publications in social networks so that more people support this dream, you can contact us if you want to sponsor or tell us if you know someone who is interested in helping us or you can also give us an economic contribution of any of the options you can find here in our crowdfunding page.

We are dreaming and preparing to fulfill this great goal, help us show that our efforts are not in vain and in 2017 we will show you the results of your contribution by giving all of us in London.

There we will be the only team from Latin America with experience and international recognition. Going to London will give a different face of Colombia and of all Latin America, proving that we can achieve what we propose because #SiSePuede.

Also, our participation in the World Cup will give the opportunity to more young people to enjoy this sport and make it recognized nationally and internationally allowing the players to develop their sports and academic growth.

By supporting us, you will not only bring us closer to London, but also you will become one of our Lacrosse family and you will be able to share our triumphs with us and support us in less happy moments.

All your contribution will be destined to make our dream come true. We will buy the necessary items to play in London and we will pay the travel expenses of each girl in our team.

One of our biggest dreams is to have a sports center to organize a league and reach the most vulnerable people. From our daily trainings we make visits to schools and places with some economic difficulties, to start practicing and show them that Lacrosse in Colombia does exist!

Through our activities, we provide other young people with a welcoming environment, away from bad habits and foster the free development of thinking and personality, making us all a great family that believes in the importance of sport and a Lacrosse team in Colombia.

Our biggest challenge, besides from going to London, is to make ourselves known due to the fact that not many people know that there is a Lacrosse team in Colombia.

We are a young team with a great dream we need your help to show everyone that WE ARE HERE!

We want to evince that Lacrosse is not just a sport, it is a lifestyle and a big family that grows bigger every day.

We do not have full time coaches however among ourselves we have looked for the way to have discipline, to train and to give everything, but it has been a great challenge that we have surpassed reaching great achievements as the participation in the world cup sub 19 in which we show only a little bit of what we are capable.

story:
The DRHH is universally regarded as Chas Balun’s finest work. The book was widely distributed around the world. Many have told us they read the volume until it literally fell apart!

The fans of this book are legion and here is just one of them. John Szpunar is the author of the phenomenal, Xerox Ferox, and here is his DRHH story:

The Importance of Reading RED

by John Szpunar

I can remember it, as clear as day.  The year was 1989, and my brother Dave and I were roaming around a place called Comix Corner in Fraser, Michigan.  I was on the lookout for a comic book called SHRIEK that I’d seen advertised in the recent FANTACO HORROR YEARBOOK.  I didn’t see it on the stands, so I asked the clerk behind the counter if the thing had crossed his path. 

“SHRIEK?  You mean GORE SHRIEK?  We have a few issues of #6 left.”

“I’ve already got that,” I said.  “I read that FantaCo was going to launch a sister title called SHRIEK.”

The man cracked a smile.  “Well, we don’t have it yet.  But speaking of FantaCo… well, we do have this.”

He took me over to a glass display case and pointed to a sturdy square-bound book that rested inside.  I couldn’t believe my eyes.  There it was!  THE DEEP RED HORROR HANDBOOK.  I’d read about the thing in a recent issue of DEEP RED, and I was very keen to get my hands on a copy.

Now, you might think that I ended up taking the book home with me, but that wasn’t exactly the case.  You see, I had recently placed a direct order for the thing from FantaCo itself.  For all I knew, it was already enroute to my home.

Still—there it was in the flesh.  The man asked me if I’d like to page through it, but I decided against it.  I would have probably stood there until I read the thing from cover to cover.  Besides, this was something that I wanted to savor.

Around two weeks later, my own copy of the book arrived, and it changed my life forever.

I was already a rabid fan of the book’s editor, Chas Balun and his groundbreaking magazine DEEP RED.  I had dog-eared copies of THE GORE SCORE and HORROR HOLOCAUST on my bookshelf, but nothing could have ever prepared me for THE DEEP RED HORROR HANDBOOK. 

The entire DEEP RED gang of writers was present and accounted for:  Steve Bissette, Graham Rae, Kris Gilpin, Greg Goodsell, Dennis Daniel, and Uncle Chas, himself.  By this time, these guys seemed like old friends, and I was overjoyed to be back in their company. 

Now— make no mistake about it—this was a book.  Over 300 pages of vital information and criticism.  This, of course, meant that there was even more meat to chew on and that the DEEP RED gang was given ample space to explore their subjects completely.

There was Steve Bissette’s mammoth chapter on Italian cannibal films, Graham Rae’s chapter on the very real evils of the BBFC, Dennis Daniel’s study of eco-horrors and biohazards, and Greg Goodsell’s excellent 'The Unwatchables'.  There was Kris Gilpin’s informative profiles on genre-giants like H.G. Lewis, Sam Raimi, and Tobe Hopper.  And there was more.  So much more.  There was Todd French’s in-depth analysis of the films of Dario Argento.  There was John Martin’s chapter on European horror cinema.  There was Chas Balun’s now-classic chapter, I SPIT IN YOUR FACE:  FILMS THAT BITE.  The icing on the cake was Chas’ interview with Stuart Gordon, and a sound sample of his GORE SCORE reviews.  It was one hell of a show.  And I had a front row seat.

It’s pretty safe to say that I ended up reading THE DEEP RED HORROR HANDBOOK more times than any other book that I’ve ever owned.  It was entertaining, in your face, and most importantly, informative. 

I never dreamed that I’d one day play the role of the old man in the classic cliché, but time has a way of catching up to you.  In my day, there wasn’t any internet.  There weren’t any blogs.  DVD and Blu-ray were light years away, and YouTube didn’t exist.  Horror fans had to gather information the old fashioned way:  by doing a lot of reading, research, and chance-taking.  When you wanted to rent or buy a movie, any guidance at all was very helpful.  And the DEEP RED gang NEVER steered me wrong.

I first got my hands on THE DEEP RED HORROR HANDBOOK in 1989.  We’ve now reached the final days of 2016.  And here I am writing about it.  The same, battered copy that I ordered all those years ago still sits on my shelf.  The pages are smudged and tattered (hell, a few of them are missing) and the cover and spine are heavily creased.  Hardly the pristine thing of beauty that I first laid eyes on at Comix Corner.  And although it wears it scars well, I’ve always wished that I would have taken the bait and bought two copies when I had the chance.  The book is now as rare as hen’s teeth, and the asking price for a copy in Near-Mint condition is more than I can afford.  Well, that’s all about to change.

When Tom Skulan of FantaCo Enterprises told me that he was planning a 2017 edition, I couldn’t believe my ears.  Almost made me want to drive to Comix Corner and pester the clerk.  The truth of the matter is this: the book isn’t there just yet.  That’s where this campaign comes into play.  With your help, we can resurrect the mighty DEEP RED HORROR HANDBOOK and put a beautiful new edition on your shelf, where it most certainly belongs.

The most wonderful thing about Chas and his crew of DEEP RED staffers was the infectious enthusiasm that they were able to pass along.  I can’t begin to count the times that I read his introductions and editorials.  As the man once said, “Get started, kids.  Write it, draw it, film it and believe it.”  I’d like to think that everyone who once read those words took him up on the offer.  They certainly still echo in my brain.

So let’s all band together and get this  job done.  I know that all of us geezers are giddy as hell at the prospect.  And hopefully, a new generation will spot a copy on the shelf, take the thing home, and fall in love with the passion that lurks inside. 

You can’t keep a good monster down, and THE DEEP RED HORROR HANDBOOK is one hell of a monster.  So join the party.  Front row seats are available now!  Let’s paint this town RED!

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need a bare minimum of $6,000 to get this project off the ground. If we raise more we will add more material to the book. If we raise less we will have to do a much smaller edition- leaving just the material written by Chas and eliminating the articles by other authors.
  • This is a grass roots campaign and we are not going to offer all kinds of merchandise. We know that you want this book reissued and that is exactly what we are going to supply!

Ways You Can Help Us Reach Our Goal

  • Get the word out on Social Media and make some noise about this campaign!
  • Don’t forget you can use the Indiegogo share tools!

The DRHH is universally regarded as Chas Balun’s finest work. The book was widely distributed around the world. Many have told us they read the volume until it literally fell apart!
The fans of this book are legion and here is just one of them. John Szpunar is the author of the phenomenal, Xerox Ferox, and here is his DRHH story:
The Importance of Reading RED
by John Szpunar
I can remember it, as clear as day.  The year was 1989, and my brother Dave and I were roaming around a place called Comix Corner in Fraser, Michigan.  I was on the lookout for a comic book called SHRIEK that I’d seen advertised in the recent FANTACO HORROR YEARBOOK.  I didn’t see it on the stands, so I asked the clerk behind the counter if the thing had crossed his path. 
“SHRIEK?  You mean GORE SHRIEK?  We have a few issues of #6 left.”
“I’ve already got that,” I said.  “I read that FantaCo was going to launch a sister title called SHRIEK.”
The man cracked a smile.  “Well, we don’t have it yet.  But speaking of FantaCo… well, we do have this.”
He took me over to a glass display case and pointed to a sturdy square-bound book that rested inside.  I couldn’t believe my eyes.  There it was!  THE DEEP RED HORROR HANDBOOK.  I’d read about the thing in a recent issue of DEEP RED, and I was very keen to get my hands on a copy.
Now, you might think that I ended up taking the book home with me, but that wasn’t exactly the case.  You see, I had recently placed a direct order for the thing from FantaCo itself.  For all I knew, it was already enroute to my home.
Still—there it was in the flesh.  The man asked me if I’d like to page through it, but I decided against it.  I would have probably stood there until I read the thing from cover to cover.  Besides, this was something that I wanted to savor.
Around two weeks later, my own copy of the book arrived, and it changed my life forever.
I was already a rabid fan of the book’s editor, Chas Balun and his groundbreaking magazine DEEP RED.  I had dog-eared copies of THE GORE SCORE and HORROR HOLOCAUST on my bookshelf, but nothing could have ever prepared me for THE DEEP RED HORROR HANDBOOK. 
The entire DEEP RED gang of writers was present and accounted for:  Steve Bissette, Graham Rae, Kris Gilpin, Greg Goodsell, Dennis Daniel, and Uncle Chas, himself.  By this time, these guys seemed like old friends, and I was overjoyed to be back in their company. 
Now— make no mistake about it—this was a book.  Over 300 pages of vital information and criticism.  This, of course, meant that there was even more meat to chew on and that the DEEP RED gang was given ample space to explore their subjects completely.

There was Steve Bissette’s mammoth chapter on Italian cannibal films, Graham Rae’s chapter on the very real evils of the BBFC, Dennis Daniel’s study of eco-horrors and biohazards, and Greg Goodsell’s excellent 'The Unwatchables'.  There was Kris Gilpin’s informative profiles on genre-giants like H.G. Lewis, Sam Raimi, and Tobe Hopper.  And there was more.  So much more.  There was Todd French’s in-depth analysis of the films of Dario Argento.  There was John Martin’s chapter on European horror cinema.  There was Chas Balun’s now-classic chapter, I SPIT IN YOUR FACE:  FILMS THAT BITE.  The icing on the cake was Chas’ interview with Stuart Gordon, and a sound sample of his GORE SCORE reviews.  It was one hell of a show.  And I had a front row seat.
It’s pretty safe to say that I ended up reading THE DEEP RED HORROR HANDBOOK more times than any other book that I’ve ever owned.  It was entertaining, in your face, and most importantly, informative. 
I never dreamed that I’d one day play the role of the old man in the classic cliché, but time has a way of catching up to you.  In my day, there wasn’t any internet.  There weren’t any blogs.  DVD and Blu-ray were light years away, and YouTube didn’t exist.  Horror fans had to gather information the old fashioned way:  by doing a lot of reading, research, and chance-taking.  When you wanted to rent or buy a movie, any guidance at all was very helpful.  And the DEEP RED gang NEVER steered me wrong.

When Tom Skulan of FantaCo Enterprises told me that he was planning a 2017 edition, I couldn’t believe my ears.  Almost made me want to drive to Comix Corner and pester the clerk.  The truth of the matter is this: the book isn’t there just yet.  That’s where this campaign comes into play.  With your help, we can resurrect the mighty DEEP RED HORROR HANDBOOK and put a beautiful new edition on your shelf, where it most certainly belongs.
The most wonderful thing about Chas and his crew of DEEP RED staffers was the infectious enthusiasm that they were able to pass along.  I can’t begin to count the times that I read his introductions and editorials.  As the man once said, “Get started, kids.  Write it, draw it, film it and believe it.”  I’d like to think that everyone who once read those words took him up on the offer.  They certainly still echo in my brain.
So let’s all band together and get this  job done.  I know that all of us geezers are giddy as hell at the prospect.  And hopefully, a new generation will spot a copy on the shelf, take the thing home, and fall in love with the passion that lurks inside.

story:
Unlike other stories of it's kind, this is the WHOLE story of addiction, not a partial glimpse. My behind-the-scenes, nothing is off limits of what it is really like, beginning at childhood. That you do not miss the signs and make the same mistakes. 

I feel for the loved ones that have addiction in their families and must say goodbye to someone that they love. The cruel reality is that some have passed away and some are still alive. What causes more pain? I am not sure. 
 

I hope The Sun is Gone "inspires" you to make a change in your life. Finding the strength and courage to move on from the present or the past. We are not promised a better life is easy; what we are promised is that it is possible.  

Please help me on this journey. Whether you buy the book with 50% profits donated to Addiction & Mental Illness programs, make a contribution or share on Facebook and your social media, I will be so grateful.  

                                                                                 -hugs from me to all of you, Jodee

For those of you who don't me, I spend my time between my home in Sylvan Lake, Alberta & Oroville, Washington. Please be confident your contribution will be allocated to drug, alcohol & mental illness programs in the country to which you live as I am conscious of the fact that will mean something not only to the recipients, but to you. You & the benefiting organizations will be recognized on www.hopeandhumility.com within 60 days of the end of the campaign. Together we can make a difference. 

  • Any family member, friend or loved one that feels lost or alone in the present or the past, or knows someone struggling 
  • Adult Children of Alcoholics
  • Anyone struggling with breaking free from co-dependency, unhealthy relationships or enabling patterns
  • Chronic relapsers or their families
  • Treatment centers as a valuable tool for family members when their loved one enters treatment
  • Doctors, therapists, health care professionals as this is the non-clinical approach as to what they teach about addiction. 
  • College or universities as a powerful debate topic as to the causes of addiction for Psychology or Sociology classes. 
  • Those in recovery as a reminder of how far you have come. And that we all make mistakes, and deserve forgiveness. 
  • Anyone that has lost someone they love to alcohol, drug addiction, mental illness or suicide

It has been a challenging last few years; it is takes work and much self-reflection to move through such loss and heartache. 

So, changed, healed and proud, here I am today. Opening myself up for a world of judgment as I too kept secrets out of shame. But shame & stigma keeps our loved one's sick and family members hiding. And for those of us that come from homes where alcoholism runs rampant, this continuing generation after generation.

I have not had a drink of alcohol in more than 20 years. The reason I gave up drinking is a secret I have kept from family members, friends, neighbors, co-workers and even my adult sons. No one that has met me in the last twenty years knows the secret I have never shared. If I had talked more openly and honestly with my little brother back then; about our past, about how I viewed alcohol, the lessons I learned, perhaps things might have turned out differently.  That is what I hope is our gift to you. 

So, for me, the reward is much greater than the risk. A love story between a brother and sister in the hopes of helping someone else.  After all there is no life's lesson in hiding in shame. 

Soon it will be a secret no more...

  

"Addiction is a family disease and it will take a change of a whole family to turn it around. A poignant story of sibling love, the ability to change and the impact family structure has on recovery."

-Dr. Frank Lawlis, Author Not My Child, Chairman of the Dr. Phil Advisory Board and Co-founder of the Lawlis Peavey PNP Center. 

"Truth hurts. And truth heals. The breath-taking honesty of Jodee Prouse’s powerful story is like a barrage of blows to the gut, as she tells of the unrelenting assault of addiction on the wounded body and soul of her family. Yet, it is that same brutal truth-telling that helped her recover from the hurt, not unscarred, but alive and at peace.  This beautifully written memoir proves that there is the power to heal in not remaining silent in the face of our most stigmatized of diseases.  I highly recommend  The Sun is Gone for the intimate and moving way it explores both sides of the truth-the darkness and the light."

  --Bud Mikhitarian, filmmaker and author of Many Faces One Voice, Secrets of The Anonymous People

"A deeply intimate and moving story of trauma, loss, addiction, tragedy and the possibility of redemption."

 -Gabor Maté M.D., Author, In The Realm of Hungry Ghosts: Close Encounters With Addiction

"The Sun is Gone is to remind oneself that no one is alone on this heart-wrenching journey. Jodee illuminates early childhood patterns that poison adult dynamics, and shows how much damage can be caused by mistaking enabling for caring."

 -Kim Barthel, Occupational Therapist specializing in Mental Health and Trauma, Co-author of Conversations with a Rattlesnake with Theo Fleury.   

You know, someone that knew my brother and I very well actually said right to me,

"Your brother was a junkie that deserved to die. He had more than enough chances." 

I am not going to spend my life arguing, debating and letting people break my spirit for the truth I know and believe with all my heart. I remind myself and others when I speak about addiction is that this way of thinking is not at all about their loved one's or my brother character, it is about theirs. 

Please help me share and promote The Sun is Gone and my INDIEGOGO campaign even if you can't donate or buy the book. I am grateful for anything you can do to help. Very grateful. 

  • Share link on your Facebook page
  • Twitter, Instagram or any of your social media
  • Send a quick video shout out telling everyone you know
  • Use the INDIEGOGO share tools!
  • Interview me for television, magazine or radio
  • Request a review copy for a book review

​

Visit me anytime at www.jodeeprouse.com  I thank you from the bottom of my heart.

This is not how I was going to end my campaign. But like the many things that have happened during my journey that I can't explain, this is an example of not only what gave me strength to continue writing for almost 3 years, but why we all need to stand together. 

This was put on YouTube the night before my campaign was to start. I awoke early to see it. I had no idea she was writing a song and she had no idea that my INDIEGOGO/book launched that day at noon. This is my niece, Jaclyn, from my husbands side of the family. Her mom didn't know she wrote it either. She has no connection to my brother whatsoever, but her sweet voice should remind us all that addiction and mental illness is everywhere. In families, from all walks of life. And it affects everyone in the family.  Everyone.

 
 

 

​

​
